I like this product just fine for the price. I have another set by another company and they are about the same. It's not supposed to be clown make up. I'm satisfied with it. There's something for all skin tones.

I actually really like it...im a tomboy so i don't do makeup. When I got the pallet...i just went on youtube for how to's and I really like the look. Gave it 4 stars because it's a little thick...but good.
This was terrible! It almost looks like a kids set for makeup, plastic ! I couldn't even use it really because the contour won't even come out of the circle with the brush! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
it did not fit my bemis humidifier without modification..i had to trim the little bead on the edge of the plug off, and then it worked fine
Power cord unsuitable for appliance.  Cord receptacle had to have polarizing feature cut out. Find an appliance parts dealer and buy without outrageous shipping and handling.

It looks like the cord that we need with the slot in it is no longer available. I have read on other sites that people used a utility knife to cut the slot into this one and it worked fine. When the part you need no longer exists, you do what you have to do to make it work.

I just got my cord and it doesn't fit!  The filter is useless without a cord!
Confirmation said it would fit all.

Cord ordered does not fit Bemis humidifier.. Back and forth with seller he kept insisting it would work however it was missing a very important part the groove in the plug to fit into the back of the humidifer.  So much for that purchase.
THIS DID NOT FIT I SENT IT BACK AND I AM WAITING FOR A REFUND.
Website told me it would fitIt did not. I melted it and jammed it in to make it fit, so it works, but is not ideal.
I wanted black, but they sent white, Bemis dis continued cord.

Quality Cord and no flaws.  Shipped on time.  As other reviews say, I had to use a knife to remove the rubber between the two female receptacles in the plug so the cord would fully engage.  This was acceptable to me and  not a big deal.
the cord is not an exact fit. you need to cut a small grove to make it fit in humidifier and it will work.

this cord worked for us!  We needed a cord for our Bemis Humidifyer and somehow over the course of the summer, we misplaced the power cord.  I was grateful that I was able to purchase just the cord, otherwise I would have had to purchase a new humidifyer,

Because I was prepared that this wasn't exactly the cord for the Bemis unit I have from previous feedback on Amazon and that a modification to the end of the cord that plugs into the unit had to be made, all is well.  I am happy with the purchase and would recommend this product to anyone who is in need of a power cord that Bemis isn't supplying any longer.  The modification makes it work perfectly.

Just what we needed to put our humidifier back into action.  Our power cord had accidently been tossed in a clean out and we were facing a new humidifier for $150 - $200.  Found this cord and we saved big time.  I would definitely recommend this buyer and this product.  Speedy delivery was great.

Buyer beware! This cable says it fits Bemis humidifiers and that is untrue. You will get a white cable in the mail if you order  this product and it is incompatible with a bemis  and is made to fit Honeywell brand humidifiers. Do not buy this item unless you want to get ripped off and the photo above product listing is deceiving, because it Does not show The correct chord that will be sent to you.

As previous reviewers said, you need to "doctor it up" a little. In order for it to fit into the Bemis 600 series motor, take a Dremel tool with a very small, round (spherical) drill bit. Grind a small groove on one side of the plug between the 2 female plugs about 1/4" long. The whole process will take five minutes.

You need to cut a groove in the appliance cord end for polarity, no big issue for a rotary tool or something with a mild removal effect (razor blade?)
 I used a 3" cut off wheel tool(air powered) to make a small groove on the outside of the appliance cord end to somewhat match the end of the old cord and note the polarity,wide outlet tang to the same wire on the appliance end to match the groove you need to cut.
Power Cord does not fit my Bemis humidifier. Too much trouble to return it.
Works just great for delivering electricity from my wall outlet to my humidifier

This thing is awful. It does NOT connect securely to my Dyson for an airtight fit. It is permanently bent and a pain to use. I cannot get it to suck hardly any lint. I'm too busy trying to hold one end connected to my vacuum! I hate it. Worst money I ever spent.

I purchased this after thinking that since we have bought our house, we have never cleaned the dryer duct... And who knows the last time the previous owners cleaned it.  So I sat down one saturday morning to clean it all out... starting with the shorter brush and vacuum connector, i cleaned out the dryer itself the best I could.  It was amazing how much junk came out of it.  then I moved on to the in wall duct.  My house has about 15 feet of dryer duct in the wall.  after working the brush around in the duct for about 5 minute, I removed the brush and then it immediately fell off the wire extention....  this could have been disasterous had it fallen off inside of the wall..  I made due to get the rest of the lint out of the duct using things I had laying around the house BUT i would not recommend this product to anyone.

I read a negative review on this item and figured there was no way it could be that bad. I was right, in part. It was actually worse than the review I read. The cable for the brush isn't stiff enough to do anything it simply bends like a wet noodle. I don't even dare try the brush for the vent hose as it fell off in my hands. The vacuum attachement is folded up and when you try to use it the area where it bends collapses so you can't vacuum anything. You will find that using an empty paper towel tube less aggravating to use instead of this poorly conceived contraption.
The plastic brush "rod" hasn't the strength to stay straight and move the brush through ductwork.  It remembers its coiled shape and broke when attempting to straighten it out.
This is awesome!  It was able to break through an 8 inch lint block in my dryer vent line, and possibly prevented a fire!
The brushes are ok but the vacuum attachment is plastic came folded and cracks on each fold,

the way they fold this flat vacuum tool, it closes the opening to vacuum.  Also, the long vent tube brush created a block by pushing lint all up to a point of complete blockage instead of loosening it to be removed.  the little brush was pretty good.
Complete set to keep the dryer free of lint.  Great product.

This lint removal system does work but it isn't as easy as you might think. The end does get caught in places when pushing it down into the back of the dryer through the lint trap. I did get it out, though, and it did have lint on it.
I will use it again.
This works exactly as described. I only wish it was longer. It also has a bit of trouble going around sharp turns.
The vacuum attachment doesn't work. Diameter of the vent brush is less than 4", the wire is very stiff and doesn't go around corners. Can't recommend this item.
POS when used it came apart so a "easy" job turned into a complete disassemble of the dryer, vent, and wall clean
"Universal" vacuum hose attachment is NOT universal.  Doesn't fit my Dyson.

I wish I could have the time back that I spent trying to use each of these ineffective tools; I would have used it toward the time required to do the job right. Save your time and money; take your dryer apart and vacuum out the vent- it's a dozen bolts and 40 minutes of your time. The "universal" vacuum attachment did not fit our vacuum...all the other tools simply pushed the lint further into an area that could only be reached by removing the vent.
Received quickly and as described.  Was able to clean out the lint receptacle and rest easier.

Very disappointed in this product. Packaging was the first issue: the tube was so badly kinked I still have not been able to get it straightened out. The second issue is that the tube does not fit my vacuum (before you comment on this, I have a variety of vacuums) and I was concerned about damaging vacuum(s) or product. I was finally able to "force" the product onto an older vacuum I have.  When I used it in my dryer lint catcher, I did not get anything at all. I wonder if this is the norm for most dryers; the advertisement led me to believe I would get "tons" of lint out. Last, the flat tube of the product did not fit under either my washer, dryer, refrigerator, or oven. Overall, I am very disappointed in this product; I gave 1 star rating because I was unable to leave a "no star" rating.

Do no buy unless you want to spend your day taking apart your dryer. First, the vacuum attachment didn't fit on my vacuum hose. The attachment has 3 pieces. The small piece on the end of the rubber attachment fell off inside the lint trap. Took 3 hours to get it out. Would have ruined my dryer and possibly have caused fire if someone tried to run dryer not knowing. Called customer service and took 4 calls just to get someone to talk to me. Save yourself the trouble and a ruined daybuy a different kit.
Amazing!!! Got out YEARS of lint trapped way down where you can't get to!!!
Worked perfectly. The long wire helped me get A TON of lint out of my metal hosing.
Not the highest quality, but it got the job done. Drying clothes much faster now!
Great product clean my vents with no issues
It works pretty well. The brush on the end really loosens up the lint. I do wish the wire was a little firmer.

The three attachments that came in this kit worked fine.  I was very pleased with the end result.  Yes the hose attachment was folded in the box, but when I took it out of the box, I inserted a yardstick into it so it would reshape.  The next day I took the yardstick out and it worked just fine--It really came in handy in sucking the loose lint out of the dryer itself (it worked well with our shop vac).  All in all I was very pleased with my order.
Apparently works well- husband uses it and has no complaints.
This product was very useful in cleaning my dryer.

Did the job it was designed to do. My problem was more extensive than this tool was designed for but it did get all the lint from the back of the dryer and the lint that was stuck in the vent from the wall but my clog was further up into the wall.

The vacuum hose attachment arrived folded to fit in the box.  This is not flexible plastic and where it had bent it had also cracked.  I tried to seal the cracks up with some glue but it still didn't work.  The places where the vacuum attachment had been folded worked like kinks and kept the air from moving.  Since the plastic isn't flexible I can't un-kink the vacuum attachment, the plastic just cracks more.  I attached it to my shop vac but it couldn't suck air past the kinks.  The way the vacuum hose attachment arrived made it useless.  The brushes however did work fine.
The wire was to stiff for manipulating the brush thru the vent stack. Total waste of money.
opening is very thin  so have to have good suction from vacumn and hose doesn't fit my Shark.
You will be amazed at how much debris that you get out of your dryer!

Not worth it.  Poorly made.  The second time that I used this the round brush separated from the handle.  I thought that I was going to have to take the drywall down to retrieve the brush because it was beyond my reach.  Lucky with a claw device I was able to retrieve the detached brush.  Would not use this again and would purchase another product.

Didn't need to use the hose piece, but the brushes worked very well. Worth the price and good product. Hoses didn't fit my machine (dyson roller ball) but I'm sure it would work ok on a normal machine. My machine was fine without the hose tho and I really just wanted the brushes anyway.
Does what I need it to do without searching for the right tools or object.
THe metal cord on the vent brush was coiled and impossible to straighten out enough to be useful.  Sent it back.
The vacuum attachment took some finagling to work with my shark pro, but the crud it sucked out was amazing!

Wish there was a zero star option :( the vacuum attachment cane cracked I fixed with tape and managed to at least use it for a bit before the hose jammed. It's such flimsy plastic that it just broke down the middle. I wasn't even eligible for return.
Dryer was taking longer to dry. Used this and saw why.
Works as made, shipped in smallest box possible ,causes everything to be curled up & smashed. It'll never be straight as when made. Causes some problems.

Sadly, this kit was TERRIBLE! The person who wrote a raving review of this product on Pinterest should be ashamed of herself. I actually feel like I was taken advantage of by wasting my money on this kit. The flat, black hose is made of paper thin plastic that cracked immediately, making it unusable. The brushes are attached to very flimsy wire which offers very little rigidity, making it extremely difficult to feed the brush into the areas of the drier where lint gets trapped. I tried really hard to get the brushes to work effectively, but eventually gave up, feeling totally defeated. I will never recommend this kit to anyone.
Cleaned my dryer nicely, helps to avoid lint fires!
This was not as flexible as advertised.  I found it difficult to turn as the steel wire was not flexible. Do you have a more flexible wire?  I would like to return/exchange
Rery easy to use and does a good job

I bought this kit because I know my dryer is most likely full of all sorts of lint and dirt. I clean the grate regularly but our clothes are taking longer and longer to dry. However, this kit was not easy to use and hardly got out any dirt or lint. And the vacuum attachment claimed to be universal but it did not fit the hose on our vacuum. Altogether, I am very disappointed.

Great concept. The flat tube that u use for the dust removal came folded up to fit in the box. The tube is so cheaply made that it collapsed at the folds and will not re-instate so to speak. will look for a suitable replacement as the concept is good.

Buy the Gardus Lint Eater instead chuck it into a drill and feed it in. The reach of the duct brush is limiting to me since I need about 20' to get the entire duct cleaned, and it is not very easily used. The Lint Eater can have extensions added to make it as long as you need. The black corigated Lint trap attatchment doesn't fit my shop vac, but the bigger issue was that it was folded so tightly in thee places to fit in the packaging that it cracked, so it had air leaks making it nearly useless. The rat tail brush is nice though.
Just used and it really did the job. I just wish the cable was about another foot longer. But everything worked
Wasn't great the plastic covering came off the long brush and was afraid it would rip the aluminum tubing so stopped and the long thing to clean under the dryer was bent so it didn't work
Item exactly as described.  Haven't actually used it yet.

Waste of time, the tube that was supposed to clean out the lint was bent in half when shipped so it could fit in the box, but of course that just made the opening even narrower which resulted in it picking up nothing at all. (think like when you kink a hose and no water comes out) The brush wasn't that great either. My tip is to use your vacuum cleaner attachments as they'll probably do a much better job.
the tip of the vacuum attachment fell off inside my dryer and caused a $200 repair
Used it once, worked pretty good. Was disappointed at small amount of lint recovered since my dryer has not been cleaned this way in 12 years.
Barely worked, was so kinked that I had to continually bring it out and try to get the suction to work again.

I wish I loved it.  I am so disappointed in this purchase.  I would high recommend not purchasing this.  The primary reason I would not purchase again is that the vacuum hose is constructed from dollar store type plastic... the type that cracks when it kinks... Well, it comes folded in three sections in the box and I had to mold it as I was vacuuming for it to suck a tiny dust ball.  The kinks made it very difficult to use.  Then - after three minutes of attempted suction - the plastic in the kink from the fold CRACKED!  I am so bummed I wasted money on this!  I ordered it and have been visiting my hubs overseas, so I have not had a chance to use it until after the return period passed.

The vacuum attachment was folded in the package. It never "rounded" out enough to provide suction.
So basically, it didn't work.
Works great - the tube that attaches to the vaccum is a bit small but it works great with some tape over it.

The brush set works as advertised.  I docked it a star because the vacuum attachment doesn't fit tight on my vacuum and it comes folded up in such a way that it's kinked.  It was still usable, just not ideal.

I couldn't believe how much lint came out of the foot-long hose and out of the body of my dryer!  I had just moved into the house and it was really a fire hazard!  I am so glad to have this product!  I am going to share it with my daughter next!
Great price and they worked when I cleaned my dryer vents.

This was a disappointment in that only 2 of the  tools would work for me, the little brush and the dryer hose brush. The Vacuum attachment would not fit my vacuum which is the tool I really wanted to be able to use. Maybe it fits some vacuums but it did not fit mine
Works fantastic, probably saved my house from burning down. Shop vac recommended to get all the lint out.

The two brushes are fine.  They met my expectations.  The vacuum attachment is terrible though.  It comes coiled in the box and the plastic is permanently creased out of the box.  After about 5 minutes of use those creases were already cracking.  The other annoyance is it just did not attach to my vacuum.  My vacuum hose and three attachments were just not sized for this thing to attach to.  It would be loose in the wide ends and not big enough to fit around the small ends of the attachments.  In the end, I don't expect the cheap plastic to hold up for more than one or two more uses, so I guess I won't have to "make it work" much longer.  I'd recommend just buying brushes separately.
The flattened vacuum hose clogged easily and then flattened itself. Wasn't very useful. The skinny long brush was useful in loosening lint. I probably wouldn't buy this kit again.
Brushes are great, attachment, not so great ! hole is to tiny to pass anything!?

The long and short brushes worked great. I did not like the plastic flat hose for two reasons. It kept falling off the vacuum hose, fit is too loose. The hose was not pliable enough. The way it was packaged put bends in the hose resulting in poor suction and lint removal.
This gets that extra fine lint that the regular lint filter does not.  Pulled alot of 'dirty lint' out grains of sand with lint on them, have the vacuum ready!
I tried to figure out how this thing work but I cant

USELESS! The "cable" is NOT FLEXIBLE! It's a couple of stiff steel thin bars encased in a clear plastic tube. It cannot go around a 90 degree (right angle) turn. I guess it would be OK for a straight run but any stick 10' long is good for that!
ONLY TEN FEET??? My vent is over 15 feet, so it's TOO SHORT for most applications.
The brush is too soft.
The vaccum tube is crushed by  being folded in the package.
I bought this at the local store and returned it. Piece of junk.
Usually just a Shop Vac can suck and blow the lint right out, and/or For $10 bucks I bought the NYLON ELECTRICIANS FISH TAPE and tape a brush or lump of cloth and snake with that, it's SUPER FLEXIBLE!

The brushes worked great.  The vacuum cleaner attachment that is supposed to be universal did not fit either of my vacuum cleaners that are very standard.  the extra long handle for the pipe brush was what made this purchase 5 stars.
Vacuum attachment came already broken where the bend is.  Brush coil not sturdy enough, gets stuck.

Happy with the 2 brushes but disappointed with the vacuum attachment. It was bent and would not straighten out nicely for cleaning. It also would not fit my vacuum hose nozzle. If I want to use it I need to duct tape it. I would not buy again.
Good tools to have if you want keep your home safe.
The hose cracked on first use.  The idea is great, but the components weak.  Dryers certainly need to be hosed out.

Didn't really buy it to work with a dryer but in cleaning out our auxiliary pellet stoves nooks and crannies it was perfect. Of course used in a cooled down not hot coal area at all on the pellet stove. But perfect.

i really like the brushes that come with it. the vacuum part does not work for me. my vent  has three curves  in it (one being a right angle and it does do a goo cleaning. for me, the only draw-back is the the vent brush is not long enough for my vent. it would be nice if i could get an extension to push the brush end to the outside end of my vent.
Kit was as described and worked very well to clean out lint trap and hose, howeve; the vaccuum cleaner attachmetn does not fit my vacuum cleaners.
this cleaning kit worked well and cleaned my vent very clean. this is also very easy to use. I think the dryer is working better now.

Definitely worth the price, compared to a service call, to clean out the clogged dryer vent duct to the outdoors. We did have to work from both ends of the duct to remove the lint clog. Cons: These tools were so compressed and folded up to fit into a very small box from the manufacturer that it was hard to "un-spring" them to use as tools. It would have been helpful to know that one must turn the extension brush only clockwise in the duct, or the brush will un-screw from its cable stem, probably in the middle of the duct length somewhere. In the end, these tools did the job.

As in the picture, there is a snake-like wire which is the primary tool.  You can reach a fair bit into the dryer to a particular point.  It works pretty well, but won't clean out the dryer to an as-new quality.
One of the tools worked ok.  The vacuum attachment didn't attach and didn't work particularly well.
works very well. Always clean your dryer vent and inside and the vent hose too.

You get what you pay for. The vacuum attachment comes folded in four - which leads to creases and prevents suction and weakens the plastic. The piece broke on the very first use at multiple folds and along the sides. The brushes are brushes.
The vacuum tube is pinched closed at the folds where it was boxed and keeps clogging and getting sucked flat.
Does not fit standard vacuums as advertised.  No suction.
Vacuum attachment isn't wide enough to suck anything up into the vacuum.
Brushes work as expected. The hose attachment  doesn't suck, you know, the one job it's supposed to do...
Really disappointed this didn't come with the fruit/veg slider bar- defeats the purpose. Tricky to switch out without breaking the plastic.
fit my drawer for the fridge perfectly...I had a question and it was answered very quickly also

The drawer was the correct size but it was missing the humidity control so it didn't function as needed.  I returned the item in the original box with the return authorization from Unlimited Appliances on 12/7/16 and am still waiting for my refund.  Not Happy
Arrived broken and no slide for the front
It was fine except for the fact it did not come with the slider component. I had to remove off old crisper and install on new.
Exact fit!  Excellent help with getting the right figment!
Good replacement for the OEM drawer which seemed a bit flimsy right off the bat, hence it broke and needed to be replaced.
Arrived missing the fruit and veggies slider and all other plastic moving parts.

Fits my refrigerator model as noted. Easy to install. Competitive pricing and delivery as promised. The adjustment tab had to be removed from old unit and broke on removal. Could be better if this unit came with crisp adjuster.

I can totally pull it in and out of my fridge! It's like it was made to go there! What will they think of next!? Fyi, though, it's ONLY the drawer. Rip all the fancy bits off the old one and put them on this replacement or you won't have as amazing of an experience as I'm having. And don't be a slob; Clean those fancy bits first before reusing them!
This drawer was a perfect replacement for the one that was broken.

Giving this drawer a 4 because it fit perfectly in my FFHS2612LS4 Frigidaire refrigerator. Shipping was also quick and had no damage. Only issue is that you have to purchase the humidity control lever separately (Frigidaire 240362201 Slide Refrigerator https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00M0YLP1C?ref=yo_pop_ma_swf ) and there are no instructions on how to attach it to the drawer, which made things unnecessary frustrating. Once I figured out how to do it though, it was very easy. Just insert the handle portion of the lever through the back of the left side hole on the drawer, give it a little twist until it sits in the hole correctly, and then you should be able to snap the right side clips into the right side slider hole.
It was a pain (and pretty expensive) to have to replace a drawer in the fridge, but this one fit perfectly, was delivered quickly and was the lowest price around. Worked great.

Some people have given this product a low rating because it doesn't come with the slider bar.  But, this is not the fault of the product nor seller.  That piece is sold separately, which could perhaps be made more clear, but that is a standard practice.  If you look up the parts to your refrigerator, you will see that each and every piece is sold separately.  If you want the slider, you have to order that and connect it yourself.  This product is exactly like the one I am replacing, so I gave it a high rating.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it is made of plastic and cracks fairly easily, hence the reason I had to replace it.
I was very happy with these buttons for crafting. Thank you for having these buttons available when I needed them.

I bought these buttons to add to a cardigan I'm making. They are a good size for women's or children's clothes. There was a sticker on the package that said $2.79, so I'm not sure why they cost a dollar more than that. If you have a good craft store around where you could get  buttons for cheap, you could probably find a comparable product. I bought these online because the local craft store has pretty high prices and these were a better value.

Great for little projects, especially baby items. There were two different sizes of white, two different sizes of black, and one size of clear. I ordered these not know what size they would be because I didn't see it anywhere on the description. I would order them again.
more buttons for every need. great value for  cost
Too small ... I needed to sew some new buttons onto my winter jacket but these certainly weren't the buttons for the job, the sucked, poor enterprise
Nice mix of black and white buttons.  Sizes are pretty standard and just what I was looking for.  Delivery was a little slow.

I was really disappointed in this purchase. I had ordered these in 7 different colors thinking I could do a lot of crafts with them. After arriving 3 days after they were supposed to, I was not happy to see how small the amount of buttons was, and how many of those few came already cracked and broken. What bothered me the most is that I paid over $6 for each package then saw that it has "$2.29" printed on the label. You're better off getting a better deal at the dollar store.
I have nothing bad to say... I ordered 130 black and white buttons and got 130 black and white buttons.
It's really hard to find basic buttons at a good price these days, but as usual found it at amazon.com. Used a lot and still have plenty. More in the pack than it looks like in the picture.
they will work very well for a the need I have for them. without a doubt

I received these today and instantly did a product refund. They are smaller than what I need and to make sure I didn't miss something, I went back to the post to see if there was a size and there wasn't one listed. It did say mini, I guess I just missed it in the detailed description. Then the package it came in says $2.29 for the price.. If you're going to sell something to make profit from it, maybe take the original price off since I paid $5.36. What a waste of my time waiting for these to arrive.. Now I need to go to the store to find better buttons. Boo.
Buttons are very, very small.  Not many matches.  Disappointed.
The buttons are mostly very thin and no traditioal hour hole buttons were included, only two hole.  Very disappointing.
Perfect size for storing my scrapbook projects before the album is complete! Sturdy box to hold everything I need.
Handy assortment of nice looking boxes. Useful for a host of storage projects.
I have no complaints about these boxes.  I have to use them for larger photo's though because I found none that would hold 8X10's, exclusively.  This is larger but will serve the purpose.
perfect for storage. I am using them to store each of my four children's pictures and moments until I can get to putting them in a book. They look nice on the bookshelf and are sturdy

I have received my Item in excellent conditions. You are splendid sellers. But I have ordered 1 more Item like the one you delivered. Pls I want to know what is happening to the other Item because I have not received it yet.
This Item is necessary to store all my documents and other things I have. I will purchase more Items like this as soon as possible

The box is fine, but giving it 2 stars because it's misleading. In the picture is 5 boxes, says assorted colors, in description and features it keeps saying boxes. It didn't specify one box and there were other sets of 2-5 that were similar in price but they were plain. If I had known it was one, I would have gone with the plain ones.

I only received one box. Nowhere does it say only one box comes, and you do not get to choose the color. The picture shows six boxes, and the ad says assorted colors. Buyer beware. Not worth the money for one box that looks used with marks all over it.
Very misleading....Thought I was purchasing 6 boxes as well should have read the comments before  ordering .
I must have missed something. I thought all 5 boxes were included when it stated it came in assorted colors.

Lovely box.  I thought I was getting the set of boxes shown, especially since it didn't ask for color choice.  The price for one box is not marvelous and I thought I was getting a great value for the six.
Yep, a single storage box for $16, not the 6 shown in the picture. Deceptive.
I was very disappointed. I thought that I was ordering assorted storage boxes and I received one dark blue box. I will be returning it, not worth the $15 price.
Needed to paint labels on some projects, needed stencils for my projects. Now if I just don't lose these like the last set I had!
Absolutely pleased with Stencil lettering kit. I use this on multiple farm equipment to ID model and year of purchase.
Great size for the harvest poster we made for our daycare room!
I like the product, but I did not get a "5". I did get two "2"s.
Product fit the bill for the project in hand. Just remember to let the stencils dry out after use or they will tear easily.
Not worth the money only good for one use, do not recommend if you have to tape letters together.
AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL ABSOLUTE WAST OF MONEY I DIDNT THINK ANYTHING COULD BE CHEAPER THAN THIN PAPER BUT THESE WERE

It's difficult to use this with spray paint. It's hard to keep the entire stencil on the surface you want to stencil, which allows the paint to pool and run. They do work, but it might be better to use a brush or paint sharpie. I'm still messing with different techniques.
These should be good for a few uses. For the price, that should be all that is reasonably expected.

Perhaps I received a bad package, but over half of my letters were not punched out. I did not return them because I had a craft fair the next day and did not have time to find new ones. I went through each one with a utility knife to cut them out.

A lot of the stencils weren't perforated enough to punch the letters out.  I used a straight-edge razor to cut through on some of them, but I shouldn't have to do that in the first place.  I tried to return them, but it said item was not eligible for a return.  I guess at only $3 and change it's not that big a deal, but I wish I hadn't ordered 2 packages of them.

These stencils are really only good for one use. I was hoping to use them in my classroom, but after the first time of using them with washable markers, these paper stencils have started to fall apart. If you're only expecting to use them one time, then these may be fine.
They are horrible if you get paint on them. They are paper. Don't recommend them.
Very cheep looking - I guess since it was inexpensive I get what I paid for

I've lost count as to how many buttons I've thrown in a drawer in hopes to get to it and fix the garments that had lost them. After a long period of procrastination, I broke down and bought this to remedy the growing collection of items that weren't being worn due to this issue.
Below are the pros and cons.
Pros:
Compact and clever folding box
Lots of colors to choose from
Plenty of needles and other accessories
Cons:
Kind of cheap quality (ie: the mini scissors barely work.. the rest isn't bad)
The compact cute box I spoke of came slightly broken( One of the hinges was broken.. BUT that could be due to USPS being careless and throwing things around!) The box still folds fine, just when its open kind of goes off line.

All in all, for $10 bucks you can't complain!
I was looking for a small sewing box for the small amount of simple sewing that I do and this fit my needs perfectly.  It's well-organized and compact.
Great product for the price and useful, especially for a student or a single person who needs an occassional button to sew on, etc.
Is a bit small, but you get what you payed for.

I thought I was getting a serious item at a good price, but NO! This is about the size of a square box of Kleenex, the spools are TINY and the rest is just cheap junk! My fault! It was absolutely too good to be true

Save your money!  I was very disappointed with this product.  The threads are the cheap ones you would get with a travel sewing kit.  The scissors wouldn't cut even the inferior thread if they had to. I opened it once, and then the case pretty much fell apart.  There is no part of this product that is even mediocre.  If I could, I would have given it no stars at all.  Especially for the money, this product is not up to the typical Amazon sellers quality.  I am returning for refund today.

This kit had nothing to do with sewing machines. Wanted to get a cheap starter kit to go with a sewing machine purchase. It arrived in good condition, but the contents are almost useless, the scissors can't cut thread! Once again, the title of this product is misleading, it has nothing to do with sewing machines at all.
I gave this to my granddaughter that was starting college. She was so happy with it. Very compact but has a lot in it. Great sewing kit for where space is limited.
this is such a small box, really thought it would be bigger box.
Cheap, poor thread like you would expect in a travel kit but too big to be used as a travel kit.

THE WORST!  It fell apart in my hands!  So small, it should stay together??  It is made of the cheapest, brittle, thin plastic.  They counted each straight pin, and the measuring tape is made of paper so  you will know what a real one looks like.  I didn't expect much, but I thought at least it would come in a case I could refill. Was I wrong!  The box is the best part.

I've been looking for a compact sewing box kit to have around the house. I can't count how many times I've needed to sew on a button or fix a piece of clothing only to find that I've misplaced the string or the needles. This set is perfect because everything you might need in a clothing emergency, you'll find in this set! It comes with 24 different colors of thread, 30 needles and a bunch of buttons, safety pins and little tools. I love that the box folds out the way it does. It makes it easy to open up the little compartments or choose which spool of thread to use. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. In my opinion, this is a great kit to have around the house. I will definitely be buying one for my mom. =)

This little compact foldaway is so cute. It is compact but not super small, it has everything you need for simple repairs and stitching garments. I love using this sewing box it has all the normal colors that would be needed for just about everything. Has a few different types of needles, and has other pieces to fix buttons, latches, and more. I received this product for my honest review, the price is extremely worth the product. I recommend this to anyone and everyone, it should be a necessity for everyone's home.

I got this product at a discount for my unbiased review. These views are my own. I love this little box it compact but opens up to has so many thing anyone would,need to fit a garment . I was surprised at how many thing can in this little box from buttons to pins to hooks, I was impressed. I would give this as a gift to anyone whom is moving out for the first time of travels a lot.
Love wverything it came with. Perfect if you need an "emergency kit" for your car or office. Perfect just to have next to the machine as well. Very handy

The Smartec Compact Foldaway Sewing Box Kit is a cute little kit that contains the essentials to do minor repairs like sew a button back on or replace a snap, but the sewing scissors that came with it are more a child's size than useful,  the small spools of thread that came with it break easily, the plastic case seems brittle, and would probably break if bumped or dropped, and the sliding plastic closures are difficult to close once you've opened it.

I could not call this a serious sewing kit. The size and brittle nature of the its plastic construction would make it a poor choice as a travel kit, and I would be very leery of giving this to any child due to the number of small easily swallowed accessories it contains.

If you need to buy a gag gift for someone then this will work for you. The rest of us might want to continue shopping around.

Item provided at discount for my honest evaluation - no obligations. My review is based upon my examination, evaluation, and actual experience in using the product.
I should have closely read the dimensions of this box. It's great if you're looking for a small sewing kit.
Great product for the money. I'm a young adult and this is great for the occasional fix. Has everything you'll need. Fast shipping.
This is what i expected, it is cheap, good for travel or beginner. Font drop it

I had a box that was this same design back in the 70s and 80s.  It finally broke down due to old  age and much use, so when I saw this one, I was excited to be able to replace it.  This is not the same; it just looks the same.  It is a scaled down child size version of the real thing.  The outside slot in this one will barely hold a slim note pad.  In the original, the outside slot was big enough to hold 1 or 2 full sized sewing patterns.  The spools of thread in this one are teensy toy spools, just enough thread on each one to sew on a couple of buttons.  The original held full  sized spools of sewing thread.  If you want a stocking stuffer for a child, fine, but anyone who has any sewing acumen will scoff at this ridiculous gimcrack being called a sewing kit.

This is a CHEAP sewing kit. but that is EXACTLY what I wanted. I love how there are so many different colored spools. The scissors aren't that sharp. but either use them or use your own pair. I love how it folds up for easy storing (however when you go to close it and lock it by sliding the little tabs, be gentle I accidentally slid mine right off and had to fight with it to pop the tab back on.) I adore all the cute little compartments for organizing. Perfect for every once in a while sewing. I would not recommend getting this if you are a high end sewing person or like to sew a lot. However I WOULD recommend getting this if you need to sew on buttons or holes every once in a while. =)
I'm happy with my cheap little sewing kit!
It was purchased as a gift for a young girl that is LEARNING to sew. She loved it. All kinds of different things in a small fold up container.
Very handy!!  Just wish it was a little bit bigger!!
For the price its perfect.. has everything you need in a little box that folds open
Very low quality, but you get what you pay for.
Itty bitty teeny tiny spools of thread, not even enough thread to hem a straight skirt, scissors were a joke, very disappointed. Wanted something useful. Wrong item.
To small to store anything else then whAt comes in it

When I closed the box for the first time, the plastic hinge snapped immediately. I could not believe how this sewing box is so poorly made and constructed. I believe it is such a waste of time to create a box that holds usable products but breaks instantaneously. Sewing is a work of art and it requires a duty box to hold the threads and sewing supplies. Truly, I was very disappointed.

It's REALLY small and feels cheap.  It has a ton of different stuff a sewer may need, but they are all tiny and break easily.  This might be good for a teenager or younger.  But, even if you're a beginner, this is not something you should spend money on.  You'll need to replace everything in there for bigger and better things in about 1 week,  just save and buy everything separately or a better kit.
I'm glad I ordered this set over a smaller one I was contemplating. This kit has just about every color thread you'd need.
The case is really tiny, the thread is poor quality, the tiny scissors broke on the 1st use, the snap buttons don't snap together (yes I was using them correctly).  Waste of $$.
Very poorly made. Falls apart on first use. Even though it is inexpensive, it is a waste of your money.
This is a joke. I could have put together a kit at the dollar store with twice the supplies for half the price. This is smaller than a ham sandwich. Do not buy
This is a unique little sewing kit that is good for a beginner.  It has various colored thread and articles  needed for sewing.  Made out of plastic so not very sturdy.
I wish I had read the reviews before buying. Looks bigger in the picture. Very small. Truly get what you pay for in this. Wanted it for a gift. Too cheap looking.
I wasn't expecting it to be as small and have nothing but little spools of thread. But other than that, it wasn't a bad item and very helpful for small items by hand.
I bought this and one of the small smartek mini sewing machines and this little kit is awesome!  It has everything you need in it and I love the little case!

This is my first sewing kit and I love how compact it is!! The only thing I don't like is that you can't put your own things in it because its already full! I can't wait to get sewing =) PERFECT starter kit!

I received the sewing machine a month and a half ago and I just had the time to use it. But it doesn't work, the motor sounds but it doesn't sew. Could you please help me..?? If it works it will be a perfect tool for my home tasks.
Thank you

I'm certainly not a seamstress nor a serious sewer... I just needed something that my boys and I could use to fix buttons, hems, split seams, etc... and this does it! It's got all the items one will need to keep on top of those little  "emergencies". It's got safety pins, thread, scissors (they're very poor scissors, but they cut the thread as needed), snaps, hooks & eyes, needles, etc. All in a compact little box. If you're looking for something serious, look elsewhere, but for the rest of us, this has it all.

I purchased this item for my 10 year old niece, who has just recently shown an interest in learning to sew.  I was not with her when she opened it, but was told that she screamed, hugged it, and began to explore it's contents immediately!  I feel like this kit was a perfect starter kit, although after it arrived, I was a little surprised by the size.  When checking it out on line, I thought it was much bigger.  Overall, very pleased with the purchase.

the threads that come in this are the only type that fit in this and are the small kind, the small white side pannels are decent for storing very small amounts of tiny things like bra clasps or button snaps i took these off and purchased a large briefcase and some normal sized craft boxes and thread cases and placed the small white sides in my kit to hold small button snaps. this item will not fit a normal size seam ripper or tiny pair of scissors. there is a piece of plastic that is raised in the storage compartment that makes it too snug to even fit a circular pack of hand sewing needles. this is not something i would recommend to someone who is serious about sewing or even a beginner. i am miffed i spent over 2.00 for this item because i have seen better containers at the dollar store.
Really cute and will go well with my Granddaughters Christmas sewing machine.  I like it for her.  Wouldn't be much use to me...
Pretty much the perfect problem solver! It has everything you need in a small compact container that you can keep within arms reach. A definite plus, for a single, apartment dweller.

I've searched for a while for a mini sewing kit to have on hand to fix things and came across this. The sewing kit's accessories are in-fact sturdy it is not a 'cheap' item at all. I have absolutely no issues with it and I handle it just as rough as I would a lerge sewing kit. There are various colors to use and the thread is strong and the needles are all durable and different sized. I've hemmed several pairs of slacks, adjusted belts and even fixed a few of my daughters outfits with this sewing kit. I am very satisfied with my purchase and the tiny plastic scissors work just fine just use the tips of your fingers.

The item is very small about one quarter the size I had expected with little timy spools of thread that have enough thread to make one minor repair.  I was really shocked by th size of the box although it is made rather well.  I just was not expecting a doll size sewing kit.  It would make a nice sewing kit in a barbie doll house.

Pretty good for the price. A few of the sewing needles were rusty and one side of the kit broke after the first time that I used it. The kit has all of the tools to get the job done so overall it is a good deal for the price.

I'm a bargain shopper and thought I was getting a good deal.  The product arrived as described, however, the quality was horrible.  The eyes of the needles are barely big enough to fit the thread, the threader broke right away and the quality of thread was poor.  I give it up for the entrepreneur who can source product from China, but can't give a good review if the product doesn't meet the bar.

I was sent the wrong product. It took them ten days to refund my money and then they told me to order it again, instead of just offering to resend me the correct product! Why would i want to order it again, when they will just send the wrong product again? It doesn't make sense.

Due to the very low quality plastic construction, the case arrived in several pieces, but the contents made the case seem well made by comparison. It's a child's toy sewing kit (especially the scissors - I had a pair just like them in my kindergarten crayon box). Really, the whole thing is a useless joke...I took one look at it and set up a return through Amazon. You won't like or find this product remotely useful unless you're five years old and want to pretend you're sewing.
This item is very cheaply made.  When I opened it the threads fell out everywhere.  One of the lids was broke.  Trying to close it was a nightmare.  I do not recommend buying this item.
Will NEVER buy this again .. it smallest and the scissor not even cut it feel like plastic.. it waste money
Flimsy, smaller than it looks.  Would not buy it again.  Amazon allowed return - hey Amazon, you rock!

I was looking for a sewing kit that had all the necessities such as needles, pins, varied thread, buttons, scissors, and measuring tape, as well as a good variety of notions. There is a great variety of notions, which I frequently need, but hate to buy a large package for one or two uses. This fills the bill. I have gone to it numerous time for some small item and it hasn't failed me yet.
That said, I should point out that the case is not very well made. It is fine to sit on the shelf and use at home, but don't travel with it as I expect it would fall apart. Also, when you do use it, open it carefully as it may come apart. None-the-less, I would buy it again just for the large variety of items it contains.
Its made from cheap materials and isn't high quality string or anything but it meets my expectations for the price.

Disclaimer: I did not buy this on Amazon. I bought it through one of those websites that offer a daily deal. I've learned to check Amazon to see if Amazon sells it for same price (many times Amazon does) and to read the reviews.

Reading the negative reviews would have saved me frustration. This is awkward to open, awkward to close. The small thread spools fall off as you open the stand-up for sided case. I just used it and one of the sides just fell off. I was able to fit it back on but I expect the hard plastic lever pins will break off and then I'll have to throw the whole thing away.

Save yourself the $12 cost here and go to your nearest dollar store for needles, thread, pins, and a plastic lidded box and you can save $8 and have bigger sized needles, thread, pins.

Don't waste your money on this.  Very very small and cheap.  A person would be better off to wait for a sale and create there own.  I gave this as a gift to my 8 year old niece and it is not impressive.  I should have known, I thought maybe the case would at least be bigger.
I thought that I would love to put this toghter, but not so much.  It was much harder than I thought it would be.  And over time, the paper has started to fall apart.  I would not buy this again.

I love crafting, but this one took forever! Be prepared to spend several hours on this project, although the end result is very pretty. Some things that annoyed me:
1. The colors on the picture are not the exact same colors that you'll receive (the colors that come with the kit are mostly pastels).
2. Be prepared to pull your hair out trying to do the flower kinds that are shaped like petals.
3. Vague directions. (But full picture tutorials are available on her website for 2 of the flowers)
But with that being said, they're very pretty and if you enjoy crafting it's something fun to do. Also, if you measure the dimensions of the tissue paper and keep the directions, you can recreate these flowers in different colors. They were simple and look very charming, but these may be a little too difficult for children.

I ordered this product after looking at other paper flowers and  nothing else was what I wanted so I gave this a try, making the flowers was very easy and quick to do, I rapped the wire stem about 3 times to just add more mass to it and it makes the flower more stable, I will be ordering more to use them as centerpieces for a party. I get comments from people who are not very crafty and complement me on making something that looks so complexed , but it will be my secret that its not hard at all :)

same thing here. So beautiful ornament!! But i have no idea how many flowers comes and what is included. I am really willing to buy. But please specify better the content of the product . Thank you
 Martha Stewart Crafts Vintage Girl Tissue Paper Flowers

My 7 year old daughter and I had tried to craft with another paper flower set: Alex My Giant Paper Flowers Kit and had had little success. We decided to give a kit another go and I went with this, as it had the Martha Stewart name. The tissue papers were pre-cut, and the kit included floral wire and tape as well as detailed instructions. We were able to make the entire kit in about 45 minutes working together, and the flowers we made looked just as lovely as the ones in the product picture! I did have to help my daughter "fluff" the flowers, but she quickly caught onto the idea. This was a wonderful set, and looks beautiful when done!
flowers are difficult to make, I guess it takes a lot of practice !
Love the flowers, instructions easy to follow.  be careful because the tissue paper is very thin.  As long as you are careful, the flowers will come out fine.  Came on time, as described.

I have bought more than one of these kits because they turn out so pretty, and last forever. Yes, as other reviewers say, they take time, but some of the flowers are easy to make in a few minutes. My eight-year-old daughter has had a blast with these, and it comes with everything you need to make a gorgeous bouquet, except the vase!
The instruction sucks!!!! You can go buy these stuffs out in walmart or hobby lobby with a cheaper price.

Flowers came out lovely. Out of all the flowers, 1 of them I couldn't do. The directions for that one was not comprehensive. Also the price one has to pay for this kit is way higher than the price one would pay to just get the materials (basically just tissue paper).
I am very disappointed with this item.  I is very, very small and it did not come with pots!  :0(

I enjoyed making these!  The reviews here are too negative. Yes, it is time consuming.  Most craft projects are.  As to the person who complained that the paper tears easily -- it's tissue paper!  Tissue paper always tears easily.  Have patience when making these and it will turn out fine.  Devote at least two full afternoons to this project.  You will have beautiful flowers to display once you are done.
This has terrible directions, hard to follow, flimsy material - nothing like it appears in the picture. A huge disappointment.
I have received only one bunch of flowers but I have ordered two and i have paid for two. I am very disappointed and fully unsatisfied...
Paper is very thin and tears easily, instructions are very poor and most importantly don't think it would look the same as advertised.

I have a friend who likes to do crafts with her 5 year old daughter, so I thought they would enjoy this kit. I have not seen it myself, so I can not comment on the quality. It seemed a litle expensive just for tissue paper and instructions, but I was in a rush. I hope to see the finished product when I visit them. I can say that it was fast shipping.
The package was open on one side and did not contain paper or all contents!  Very disappointed in whoever packaged this and opened the kit.
You get ribbon, tissue paper and instructions on how to gut them out.  Not flowers like pictured.  It should show the product shipped.

Disappointed in paper flower kit. The vase doesn't come with it.
 I tried 2 different flowers and ruined each 1.
The instructions seem to be for someone who already knows how to make paper flowers.
 My niece is going to try and help me because my granddaughter age 4 would like a basket of, "Paper Flowers in a basket", so they will last forever!
She remembered the live flowers in a basket I gave her for birthdays, eventually they died and made her sad!
These are really cute and easy to make! Mine looked just like the pictures! The paper is really thin so you just have to make sure you are careful not to tear it.

hard!! I read reviews about the instructions being a little vague. Yep. just a little. I figured I would be able to figure it out. I mean how hard can twisting some tissue paper be?? Well I gave up pretty quick.
I'm going with a fellow reviewer, "NOT FOR THE EASILY ANNOYED", bout sums it up.

Bought these to use as center pieces for a baby shower.  Making the first set and I not going to do anymore.  The pin cushion type flowers are fine but the "folded petal flowers" are an epic fail.  I have tried every way possible to make them work.  The instructions are virtually worthless.  I have been crafting for over 40 years and am pretty good, but this kit is just a mess.

Directions need to include "how many pieces of tissue per flower".
Include more florist tape & stamens... To match the current directions Or revise the directions.
I used four kits to create eight beautiful wedding rehearsal bouquets/rehearsal dinner decorations/bridal suite decorations. Each kit took 4-6 hours to complete.

I ordered these for my lady for our 4th month anniversary.  The description doesn't explicitly state you have to make them yourself.  Now I am completely embarrassed and dropped the ball on our anniversary gift.  I'm livid with this order and won't order this ever again.  If I wanted to MAKE them I would have gone to Hobby Lobby or Michaels!

I bought these for my wedding flowers. I was getting married in the desert and could not have real flowers and then I substituted better, double sided, tissue paper from a fine paper store.  So these were a learning curve for me.  I ended up making wedding flowers with my friends and they were fabulous.
Unless you are just good at this already these are too hard for me I gave up and just did the pom pom flowers. very complicated but all the supplies are there, poor directions too.
Love these! They were really easy to make! I filled a vase in an hour! I might attach then to pens next time.
Product is packaged in paper . Gave to my granddaughter , but had to apologize for how chintzy the present looked. I thought there would be more to it.

I enjoyed this, I did it by myself while watching TV and I set them in a vase for a door side table.  The colors are lovely.  The directions were a bit tricky to understand and things were not labeled well.  Be prepared for a bit of frustration, but otherwise a classic Martha craft
It's really horrible product and messy , we didn't even use them ! have of them were broken and and went immediately to the trash , save your money , and something else !

These are terrible.  The colors are not as pictured on the box, they are very pale.  You cannot tell the difference between the colors even when you color them right alongside each other.  There were also only a few colors in the box, not as pictured again - for example, I got four blue, four yellow, four pink, and four orange.  But really, since they are all so pale, it amounts to a box of 16 white chalks.  Also, they are very brittle.  One arrived broken, and one broke in my daughter's hand while she was trying to write with it, and when I tested out another one (thinking she had pressed too hard), that one broke in half with very little pressure.  In short, these were a waste of money and effort.
colors are not very vibrant. not what the image looks like at all.
My grandchildren love to draw. I believe chalk will be another way for their creativity.
My granddaughter loves the chalk.  Uses it everyday.
I SHARPEN THIS CHALK TO WRITE CUTTING LINES ON FABRICS.. GREAT STUFF AND KIDS ENJOY IT WITH THE SMALL CHALK BOARD I GOT THEM
Chalk breaks VERY easily. Arrived broken in some cases.
I didn't get the chalk. The package was opened, poorly taped closed, with no chalk in it!
Came with every single piece of chalk broken!
Bought chalk for somewhere around $4. Found a giant sized box of sidewalk chalk with 30+ pieces for $4 at Walmart. Not so excited about the price, but the chalk itself wasn't anything bad.

half came broken and I was almost upset until I tried using them and realized they only break if you touch them. Colors are not very intense either, but I was using blackboard stickers and not a real blackboard, so your mileage may vary.
Like the colors, but they all came broken.  If I was a kid, I would be upset.

Great Chalk. To be used on a green board where the white does not show much. I am student teaching 7th grade English and prefer to use a blackboard rather then a SmartBoard. Yellow seems to work best and hopefully some of the others will be bright enough so the students can see. I like that its small, but I would have preferred the bigger ones. I don't know why people go into "mad cow" attitude when they get their chalk broken, it is chalk. Buy the sidewalk one if you want it to endure.
Does not break like the small size chalk when our 3yo writes on board
Colors are very pale. Much less vibrant that in the photo. I'm disappointed in this product for $6.00.
These are definitely cheap... They are packaged poorly and only about three of them were in the piece, the rest were broken in pieces.

The chalk is great, it is not dustless but good chalk is not dustless and this writes well.  It is also gluten free if someone decides to eat it, haha.  The reason for only two stars is the price, $11.81 is way too much to pay since you can buy it locally for $0.47/box.  I can't tell you Where you Might get it for that price but use you Wonderful iMagination and you might just "SEE" it.
The color is a little dull, but it's fine for what I'm using it for
We love playing with these. Vibrant color, easy to clean and great price for the number of pieces.
These all snapped in half while writing with them.  I won't purchase again.  Crummy quality
It was good to find actual chalk still available.  I need it for old fashion chalk board at church.
Once I received them they were just about like dust. Every one was broken and was just about unusable. I would recommend just spending a little extra and buying them from a local store.
This thing is the size of a quarter! You are better off buying the larger roll which is for some reason cheaper!
It never peeled off, not even the open edge on top.  Some tapes the top edge doesn't stick, but I've never had that problem with this tape.  It sticks & stays tight.
My granddaughter ordered this for her duct-tape crafts, and she absolutely loves this. The colors are awesome and it is exactly what she wanted.

I love these rolls of mini duck tape! The width (3/4") is great for crafting and small fixes around the house or on-the-go. Perhaps use it like you might use washi tape and get creative? It comes in basic black and silver plus some colors/patterns. There isn't quite the same selection of patterns as the original duck tape line yet, but perhaps after being on the market for a while they will expand the options available. I recently made my dad an emergency car kit for Christmas and I made sure to include one of these rolls as a mini version of a very useful tool!

This is going to be more expensive than regular Duck Tape per square foot, but if you don't want to split tape or want a thinner width for a project- these are great.

The tape is good quality and sticks well with burnishing (rubbing down firmly) and the width makes it perfect for trims or small fixes. The finish is the same as regular black Duck Tape. Glossy, water-resistant, and thick enough to be strong.

Plus I just love the size of these rolls. They are incredibly cute. The inner core is printed. It doesn't have the logo like the full size rolls do, but it's clearly a mini roll of Duck Tape. It's also labeled as Made in the U.S.A.
it works well and stays glowing for a long time, but if you put it on some thing that your hands are going to be on such as a controller or a door nob then it wears down really fast.

I'm not sure how this ended up being mislabeled as 15 yards, when it's actually on 72 inches (2 yards). I contacted Amazon to let them know of the mistake and to return the item, but seeing as how it still says 15 yards, I figured I'd put this out there for anyone else who might end up ordering this and getting a much smaller roll of tape than expected.

The tape itself does glow, but I never took it out of the package (since I returned it), so I can't say much else about it. Other Duck brand tape I've used has been great; I imagine this would be the same. I would have kept it if it didn't cost so much for such a tiny roll!

Make sure you understand the length/width of this product before purchasing. It is a very small roll despite the picture looking like a normal sized roll.
The tape does function well, however. Glows bright and adhesive holds well
This does actually glow pretty good. I didn't read the description very well though and was surprised how small it was.

I wish I could give this product 50
Stars.  Compared to old school glo tape, where you had to peel
The backing, this is a joy.
This tape is very cool! Glows so bright, it literally lights up my daughters room at night so no need for night lights anymore! :)
Pick is extremely misleading.  This roll is smaller than a roll of scotch tape. It did glow, but there was not much of it.
Worked very well and glows in the dark as promised

Tape was easy to cut off the roll but I used it on light switches in the hallway to be able to see them to click on to be able to see down the hallway.  You could see the piece if you stood right in front of it.  Not any longer and just did not work.

I obviously misread the size, see picture... So far, I haven't seen it glow at all. I've had it on the floor with lights on for days and when the lights are out, there is no green luminous color from the tape. Very disappointed in this....

Used on my flashlight in my basement that I have placed near my breaker box. If the power goes out Ill be able to find it. Going to put some on the front of breaker box too!  It glows well in dark too!
This is extremely tiny.  I thought it was going to be a big roll of duck tape from the pic and name, but admit I should have studied the measurements more closely. It also doesn't glow very brightly.
I love this tape. It does the job of what I purchased it for. Its just too small. Not only do I recommend it, I suggest you buy 2.
Roll is REALLY small but it worked great for my project.
This roll is tiny, but it works great to cover several (10+) disc golf discs

Its my own lack of reading up on the product but when I purchased I didn't realized it was going to be so tiny! Its smaller than a normal roll of scotch tape!! I thought it was going to be as large as a regular roll of duck tape. I feel that I could have read more into it but the way the pictures made the product look were a bit misleading because you cant tell how small it actually is.
Be aware that this is smaller than a roll of electrical tape.
Glow in the Dark tape... It's good Tape... & it Glows...
Even with the comments about how small this is I was surprised when I received it.

I read the reviews so I knew this is a small roll of tape. No surprises.  It is the size of a fifty cent piece.  That was perfect for the project I needed it for, and I didn't have to pay for a large roll I didn't need.  I found that it glows seven to eight hours.  You don't necessarily have to put it under light to get it to glow.  I found that the TV in a dark room also works. I am very satisfied with this product.
Why is that tape so small? It should be 25 cents

ok ha ha you got me.
my bad.
you have to put it in the sun or light.

if I WAS IN THE MOVIE " DOWNSIZING"  IT WOULD BE PERFECT AS THE WHOLE ROLL IS NOT MUCH BIGGER THAN A QUARTER HAHA  THANK GOODNESS I HAVE A GREAT SENSE OF HUMOR BECAUSE I WAS VERY AMUSED AND LIKE MINIATURE THINGS . BUT DONT' BUY IT IF YOU THINK Y OU ARE GETTING A STANDARD ROLL . they SHOULD TELL YOU IT'S MINIATURE
Well I was expecting my tape but when I opened my box all it had inside was a wad of paper! No Duct tape.
Not the product pictured! I got sent a small roll of what seems to be glow medical tape that isn't sticky at all!
I love this stuff. I use it on the outside of our RV and it actually hold up pretty well. Has a masking tape feel to it though.

Wow - you look at the picture and think you are getting a roll of duck tape.  Little do you realize you are getting a miniature version of duck tape. Here's a picture of it next to my mouse.  Cute, isn't it?
Should have looked at the size more closely. If they could title this Mini tape or something that would help a LOT. It is TINY! It glows okay. Not great.

I love these mini duck tapes.  I put one in each of my grandsons stockings.  They can put them in their glove compartments for an emergency fix.  I may order more so I can have one for myself.  Handy little item that won't take up much room.  I may be over 75 years old but I have learned in these years that you can fix a lot with duck tape.  It was a go to for my deceased husband and I use to kid him about it. I thought it was a "man thing" until he died and I began using it for small fixes outside and in.  lol
Don't know how else to say this but it is tape that glows in the dark. I have charged the tape with a black light and seen it hold a charge for a minimum of 4 hours.  Works as expected.

Absolutely useless. It looks like a roll of duct tape, but it's the size of a roll of electrical tape. The dimensions are clearly readable in the picture, so it's my own fault I guess, but I had no idea duct tape came in such a small (useless) size.
Adhesive didn't stick at all. Duck's products usually sticks quite well, but this wasn't even as sticky as masking tape. Lasted less than a day
Ordered assuming it's the same size as every other roll of duct tape. Since there is nothing in the picture that shows scale I give 2 stars.
NOTICE IT IS VERY SMALL!!! it still glowed, still was sticky but was super tinny.
Reasonable value. Took a bit to be actively glowing at night

Worked out well for my needs.  I needed to mark a bathroom door knob so I could find it in the middle of the night without turning on lights.  I cut a very small 2" strip of this tape, put it on door frame next to handle, and it works great for me..  Without any sun or room light after 7 PM, it is still visible and glowing 8+ hours later in the middle of the night.  As others have noted, roll is small in length and width - but it worked out great for me.
This works for what I bought it for - as a marker in my garage for backing my car in.  Price is right.
I was surprised that it was a super small roll.

I bought this tape after buying the glow in the dark stars, I liked how well they stick, the brightness, and how long they glow. Since I bought this to decorate my scetch books it is the perfect size for me. Yes this is the same size as washi tape, but longer than some of those I have boughten and it also sticks better. I would love to see them come out in other colors, but very happy with this tape.
Kinda tiny, but it works.  Used it along the side of stairs so we don't trip at night.  The roll is very small though.
Pay careful attention to the dimensions.  This is a ridiculously small roll of tape that as other reviewers have noted, is virtually useless.
This "Duck Tape" is microscopic. It roughly 1 tenth the size of a real roll of duct tape. See picture attached.

Its not small, it tiny!  Dont think this is a regular size roll of  duct tape only shorter because it is not.  This is tiny.  A little large than a quarter in diameter and only 3/4 of an inch wide.  Never saw a roll this small before.
I will never buy it again.  It does not glow in the dark as advertised.  Wasted my money.

Poor Quality and not worth the price in my opinion.  These rolls are truly mini sized.  The roll I received seems to have been stored in an extremely hot environment because the tape adhesive is so melted that it's very difficult to pull the tape off the roll to even use it.

Don't bother purchasing this item.  Go to your nearest craft store or Walmart and get a full roll of patterned duck tape for the same price.  Quite disappointed with this purchase.

This it is a good Duck Tape to use for safety. It's only 6 ft and only one little roll and only 3/4 wide but it will glow when the lights go out. It lasts only a short while. Depends on how much and how long of light it gets to charge it. so times very for how long it glows
Very small amount of tape and barely glowed

Yes I can read(3/4x72") but it is still shocking to see how tiny this room of tape is. A roll of FrogTape would be something like $45  if sold at a similar price per foot.....
At this price you should be able to see it glowing from space.....
It glows. It's Duck Tape.  But the photo is decpetive because never in my life have I seen a roll of duck tape that isn't the size of a roll of duct tape.
I was expecting a typical size. Never would I imagine something this small. I guess the camera really does give it a bigger look.
I thought I ordered a lip gloss by mistake.  It's tiny, but I just used it on my tiny remote control so I can find it.  It seems fine, I really didn't notice any glow in the dark.
Just a 1 inch thing of tape. What a ripoff. I knew I should have read the reviews.
The pictures did not depict that  this was a very small role of tape.  I was extremely disappointed with the size and wish this detail was amplified a little more.

Okay, yes, it's small. Other reviewers who gave it a poor review based on that need to read product descriptions more carefully!

That being said, this is great tape! Bonds to itself well and seems to be extremely tough. It has a rough, cloth-like surface as opposed to a more traditional duck tape "plasticy-ness," and it's rather thick.

It glows a bright, strong green, and does so for a long time! It won't shine super bright for very long (if you hold it up to a light), but it does have a low glow that lasts for an hour or more, which is totally perceptible in the dark.

Would highly recommend! They also sell a regular sized version, if that's what you need!
did not like the glow feature of the tape, because the "glow" was not that strong.  Did not bother to return the product, since s/h was pricey.

I didn't read the full details. Was blown away when I saw how small this was. Not much bigger than a quarter. So if you want tiny to maybe put on your phone then its for you. I was just shocked. I guess I should have read all the reviews. My bad. But not worth the money. I'll go to Walmart next time for this product. Normally I am a big Fan of Amazon. I get all my Sewing and Quilting from Amazon with no problems. Hope this helps someone.
Good tape just watch out for the size of the roll.  It's smaller than you think. It's about the size of a roll of washi tape.

The photo makes this look as though it is regular size duck tape. When it arrived it was tiny, smaller than scotch tape but about 1/4. Do not recommend. If you are going to sell a product why put a deceptive photo up? Put an actual photo up and let people judge if they want to spend money on your product as it actually is.

Tape didn't glow as expected. Was a bit disappointed. Not sure why either.

The light was dim and not bright.
Very small in size.  I would not reorder for the price.

As many people mentioned in reviews, this is a very small roll of tape (almost comical in size)!  But, it's just what I was looking for.  I needed to put a tiny bit of glow in the dark tape on a light switch just inside the RV to know which to turn on for the inside lights.  I literally cut a piece about 1/2 inch x 1/2 inch for this purpose.  It does glow in the dark as advertised.  The tape has almost the feel of that white bandage tape that comes in a first aid kit...not the feel of slick regular duct tape (if that matters to anyone).
Pay attention to the size, this is a very tiny roll of tape.  Works great.

I am SO happy with this tape! My #1 use for this genius invention...I use it to mark the corners of tables in my screened-in porch. I don't always want to turn on my patio light but I like to sit outside after dark. Just a couple little strips (that you can barely see in the daylight) and no more stumbling into things ;) The uses are endless...that's just my own quirky fave!
Love this tape for projects using cardboard! Like the vibrant design.

It's a tiny roll, but perfect for our purposes. We used it to mark the rungs on my son's new bunk bed so he could find them in the dark. It's been on the ladder for two months now and hasn't come up at all.
Although it was very clear-- I didn't realize it was so tiny. Check the size!
This is a small role, but works well.  Still stuck down well and still glowing brightly 6 weeks later.

Super Tiny and maybe 2 ft long.
However it does glow in the dark
Smaller than expected, but as far as the glow in the dark property, it worked from what I was using it for.
Beware!!! This tape is sooooo small!! Pay attention to the dimensions, Not the picture. I wish that I had

I don't really hate this tape, but I hate the perspective it's listed as.  In the list of different duct tapes, it had the exact same size in the picture.
I makes it look like a regular rolls, but it's tiny.  More like a roll of electrical tape.

Worked very well for me for marking camping gear and outdoors on my property.
The pic is from a peace I put on my shed two years ago. It's been in direct sun/wind/rain/snow for both years (it's a bit dirty) but still glowing.
speedy delivery; great product and condition; exactly as described. We have enjoyed using this! Would recommend seller to everyone and will buy from seller again.
The size of this is perfect to keep in my suitcase for any needs that come up while traveling
Sucks!  Very thin, barely glows, extremely small amount!  NOT duck tape... don't be fooled!

this roll is tiny, about half the size of standard scotch tape roll, but only 6 feet of tape. Don't buy this. I put it on my remote controls to be able to find them at night better, but it is not very bright.
This roll is about the size of a large coin.  Much smaller than I was expecting
Glows great. Just be cautious this is a tiny roll of tape.  Read the sizes before ordering.
This roll of duck tape is the size of a fifty cent piece. IT"S TINY. IT"S UNLESS! PLEASE BE AWARE!!!!!
Real small pack of tape.  About the size of of 1/2 dollar
We bought this for a Halloween costume, and it worked great.  It really does glow, especially if you give it a good charge with sunlight.
The glow-in-the-dark duct tape glows for a while then stop not worth buying.!

Look at product description.  Very small, picture makes it look large.
Tape needs extensive time in light for very little time of glowing.
This tape is sooooo tiny. It looks big in the pic, but it's not.

Itsy Bitsy....it defense of the listing it does say the size.  On defense of the consumer, we most likely wouldn't look because who has ever seen such a small duck tap.  I automatically assumed it looked the same as every other size duct tape.  Especially at this price.
I did not know that Duct tape made these micro rolls.  Glows in the dark well but this roll cost almost as much as the full size glow in the dark duct tape at Lowes.  Wish I had read the reviews
Don't waste your money.  If you read it's only 72 inches by 3/4" wide.  Too pricey for so little.  Roll is barely bigger than a half dollar in size.  Buy paint instead.

This comes on a tiny little roll.  But it does exactly what it claims to do. It glows in the dark. Expose this to some light and it will glow like crazy. And it adheres like crazy too.
I bought some Glow in the Dark paint at the same time I bought this. And I bought the best Glow in the dark paint there was, based on ratings. This duck tape, glows just as brightly as does the paint.
