My guineapig kept walking out of it until I spent enough time (usually 2 minute intervals with it on and me petting him, then taking it off for 5 minutes, then putting it back on for 2 minutes, etc. until he learned to keep it on) and now we walk around campus having fun on his leash.
I tried it with my hamster, he could just slip out of it. It was a great thought but DONT TRY IT ON ANY KIND OF HAMSTER.

My cat goes from fourteen to twenty pounds (her and Elizabeth Taylor). However this wouldnt fit her at her most svelt let alone during her managed to get other people to give me treats and xtra food times.  More appropriate for a tubby kitten perhaps...not adult cat like a Maine Coon or just hefty normal cat.
One of the plastic clips broke while I was taking it off the cardboard. Couldn't even use it; not worth even the time and effort to return.
The item was awesome! But the fact that they sent the wrong size of harness makes me mad. I have three rabbits and a small DOESN'T fit them!! I needed a medium

I bought this for a small female Lionhead rabbit (whos always naturally been very slender).  Shes small for an adult female, even her dewlap is smaller than a typical female rabbit.  I went to the petstore and looked at the "large" size.  Its too small for a rabbit (unless you have a very small breed).  Even the XL would be too tight on a larger breed.  If you want one for a larger/heavier rabbit, I recommend looking elsewhere OR simply sew on more Velcro to the straps (it works great and still keeps them secure!).

For my rabbit though, this is a great harness!  The material seems strong and has a little stretch in it for comfort.  I was worried about the neckline, but she didn't have a problem with it.  It didn't constrict her.  The slip around strap on the neckline gives me added security.  She hopped around quite happily.  The leash is short though (just pick up a longer one at the petstore or the dollar store).  I cant imagine her being able to slip out of this harness.  I couldn't beat the price or the quality.  Very happy!
Definitely not for small pets. My daughter was incredibly disappointed when she couldn't walk her pets. It just went to waste.

I got this vest and leash for my mini-lop rabbit.  He is average size for a mini-lop (about 6lbs), and had to get the extra-large!  The large probably would have fit him, but it seemed a little snug.  It is somewhat adjustable.  If you have a large breed you may want to consider buying it in person at a store for easy return if it doesn't fit.  It does run very small.  But it is a very nice harness.  Fairly easy to put on and he seems comfortable in it.  He has never managed to escape from it, but is a very calm bunny and doesn't seem to mind wearing it.  The leash isn't that long, but I feel like that gives me more control of the rabbit, though don't expect to be able to walk a bunny like you would a dog.  Ours is a darker royal blue, very nice color.  Overall a nice harness if you can get the right size.
I have little Chihuahua's and it looks cute on them. Good for a triple coat chi as it doesn't mess up it's fur.

I thought that the vest was a good fit for my bunny. I have a mini rex, which is like a medium sized rabbit so It's good that it's adjustable, and it seems to be comfy for him. The lead is stretchy so that keeps him from choking when he hops to fast for me to keep up! It's easy to get on,  he doesn't struggle too much. and he really likes to go outside. I got it because I wanted him to be able to go out, but I don't have the money or the time to build a rabbit run. Also, everyone goes nuts when they see me walking my rabbit because he's so adorable. well worth it!
We bought this for our young guinea pig and after several attempts we gave up because it just doesn't fit.  The reviews for rabbits seems to be OK but it definitely doesn't work on g-pigs.
I hate this item!!! Big rip off we tried to get this stupid harness on the hampster for an hour but it never holds the hampster in!!! :(

When i first got the leash i tried it on my bunny...she did not like the leash at first and was struggling to get it on her but i managed to get it on her. The leash is not that good but you can hook a different one on it. I got a blue color which is a light pretty blue,i have not tryed to walk her outside cuz i recommend that u get the bunny used to the leash so she won't slip out!!The shipping was very fast too ^U^
I was a 2 lb rabbit and this harness was way too small for him. I think it is intended for a ferret, or a slimmer animal. nothing with a round middle, it won't ever fit.
a harness is great when I want to give stew a little more freedom than just his pen, he does fight me to put it on though
Though it is difficult to get Stew to wear his harness, it does fit and I feel safer when he is outside of his pen.
Mislead the size and the fit...and became too difficult to return to we kept it even though it didn't fit.

I have a juvenile dwarf rabbit, seven weeks old when I got him and less than 2 pounds. This harness was still much too small. It says it can be used for rabbits but I think it would only fit rats, small gerbils and ferrets.
didnt fit my pet rat and one of them is pretty big they just slip out of it so completely pointless and not what i thought it was

We puchased these for our (3) guinea pigs and they are awful. The leashes do not fit on the animal - we tried in vain for 45 minutes to get these to work and the guinea pig simply puts its front paws through the front of the velcro and slips right out. We woud have returned these products (the three we purchased), but the kids were SO excited (thinking they would work) that they tore the packaging. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! These should not even be sold.
Fits my rabbit nicely! I love to take him on a walk with this. My only complaint is that the leash is way too short, and the bell fell off very quickly.
Safe harness for a small Chihuahua. Came with leash and is nice! Would buy for another dog, and wish I had

Very well made. I would like it a size smaller for my purpose though. I wanted it for my chipmunk, but he is too small for it and slipped right out. Other than size I  believe it well made and well designed

Mine came in black which is perfect because my bunny is a boy and also has black fur c:
He is a lion head rabbit and it fits perfectly.

My guinea pig is less than one year old, and this harness was still too small for him.  The neck is too tight, and even once I expanded it with Velcro, the waist was too tight anyway.  He looks ridiculous in it and doesn't like it one bit.  I'm sure it works fine for ferrets, but don't buy it for a guinea pig.  Both you and your cavy will be disappointed.

i liked it over all but there was some things that could change, i did not like that they did not have a clip for the belly. it came off all the time but it fit good. the  leash could be longer so they could run more.

I bought this for a lizard, but it's too big just yet.  When my Tegu gets a bit bigger i'll get a lot of use from it.  Very high quality.  Very sturdy harness, I did a lot of tugging and what not.  My step daughter uses it right now for her rat at her mother's house and she says it's very secure.  So I probably have to order another one.  The only downside is that I can not pick my own color.

This scratching post is useless, unless you modify it like I did.  My cat wouldn't touch it.  I ordered sisal rope and some catnip spray.  I wrapped the sisal rope around the entire cat tree and secured the rope with a hot glue gun here and there.  Then I sprayed the rope with a very strong catnip spray and now my cat loves it.  Cats are naturally attracted to sisal rope, and I hated of the idea of wasting my money since the cat wasn't using it prior to adding rope.  Another bad thing is that this scratching post is very lightweight.  If you use it in the upright position, when the cat scratches it will fall right over.  So I only use mine in the laying down position.  So unless plan on modifying this, don't waste your money.

I bought this about a month ago.  My cat uses it sometimes, but not as much as her cardboard scratcher.  I will occasionally put a little catnip on it to generate more interest.  Although, I have observed her rubbing on it at random times (without me adding catnip).  She does likes it.

Also, I think it does better laying on the side rather than standing up.
The scratching post broke off of the stand when my cat used it.
My cats completely ignore this scratching post. In fact, they scratch the chair right next to it and behind it.
Fabulous scratching post; my cat loves it!  Subtle and attractive.
Not good quality at all. The post wouldn't even fit in the base.

The cats love it. As someone else mentioned, it will not stand up on its own if a cat is scratching it.  It is too lightweight for that & will tip over---BUT my cats love it & we just keep it tipped over! They stand on it, lay on it or over it & hide things under it. They wrestle with it & scratch their chins on the edges of the bottom piece.  They love it & laying flat there is no problem with them scratching the heck out of it.  So it may not appear to be as sturdy as a wooden stand up post, but if you are creative (actually the cats tipped it the way they wanted it) & just tip it on its side, it works great.  I would buy another. The carpet is a very tight knit indoor-outdoor type carpet & does not fray like the stand up rug posts. My cats do not like the sisal rope scratchers so we are left with the rug posts that fray & they destroy or something like this.

I stand it upright with the feet tucked under the chair the cats over the years shredded (we then reupholstered in microfiber), and weight the feet under there with a couple of dumbells. Happy cat, safe chair, happy me!

These are pretty much the only scratching post my cat will use, I should have never introduced her to it!  Originally they sold these at Petco, but now I can only find them on Amazon.

They are great and last forever!

Good price if your cats like it.  My cat and kittens do not find this scratch-post amusing.  We got this one as opposed to the big jungle-gym types because we thought it would be more appropriate for the older cat.  But no one likes it (standing up nor lying down).  They prefer the rugs over this.  Maybe I'll try the jungle-gym...

Our cat loves the one we purchased for her four years ago buy you can imagine the condition it was in after that amount of time.  We could not find it in our local stores.  Amazon had a fair price and it was delivered promptly.

This post is great for cats who like to scratch the carpet or furniture with the heavy upholstered weave. It's not for all. I have sisal rope post that cost 75$. The best quality made and my cat barely touches it. He loves this one. It is not heavy and is best wedged between something or under something so it gives them a sturdy hold when they scratch. I love the raised curved edge as I prop it beneath a chair and it's the perfect length so it fits secure and my cat can stand lengthwise if he pleases on all 4's to scratch. My cat is 17 lbs mostly muscle and has not encountered any issues pulling it out of place when it's secure in that fashion.

I got this for my cat a few months ago and he won't even look at it. I've tryed showing him what it is and put his paws on it and still nothing. I've haven't tried the cat nip stuff, but he;s never had it so I'm not sure if that would help any. I wouldn't buy it again.

A very nice cat scratching post that was reasonably priced and rather attractive for a piece of carpet on a stick. The compact size make it ideal for an apartment and it is nice that it can either stand up or lay down. It's a bit wobbly when standing up though. My cat loves having it tipped over so she can chase her toys around it.

We have a dog that always wants to chew on the bottom of the bed post. We tried several different things, but were forced shut the dog out of the room until we found this product. It works great and has given the dog full run of the house again.

Most effective product I have found.  I used it on an outdoor tree that one of my dogs was found of eating.  I have both a large lab and a small Aust cattle dog.  Both were curious at first but neither were found of the smell and left the tree alone.  Product is also effective at repelling humans - I gaged nearly each time I applied it.  I did not try the product indoors thus I do not know what lingering influence it would have on people.  Largest downside I see is the need to reapply occasionally.  I reapplied to my outdoor plants once every 10 days.
Cleared my sinuses right out. Taste and smell does tend to linger. Seems to deter my cat pretty well. Suggest using in well-ventilated environment.

The reviews are right. This doesn't really work. My puppies didn't like the taste. However, they still licked on it. They would just shake their heads after they lick it. Then lick on it again. I wouldn't buy it again.

I used this for my puppy that was teething and biting everything that was in sight! I used this spray and saw results immediately. She had stopped chewing furniture, rugs, plants, shoes, even my other dog. Ha! Very harsh smell but be careful! You can actually taste it which is very bitter, soapy taste to it. Blargh! Otherwise, it worked well for my pooch.

We've got a young lab that will chew on "anything" and was pulling up/chewing up our neighbor's solar yard and walkway lights. I sprayed this all over the new ones I bought to replace the damaged ones. The dog left them alone for about 3 weeks - then, I found one back at our place (but not chewed up). I sprayed it, reset it, and resprayed all of the other ones again. This does seem to work.

Awesome stuff, it stopped my puppy from chewing on the molding around the floor (knawing off our paint and huge chips of wood), our wooden chairs, and anything else we didn't want her destroying. I also recommend telling them 'no, that's not your toy', and then giving them one of they're toys that they're allowed to chew on and say 'chew on your toy' to help redirect that behavior. It's natural for dogs and especially teething puppies to want to chew on things and they need to have something they can chew on, but this spray really helps to let them know what they can't touch. It's really powerful stuff, definitely hold your breath when spraying it (a mask would probably be better) because if you breathe it in while it's airborne it will linger in your mouth and it tastes HORRIBLE!!
Not only did it not deter my puppy, he actually likes to lick it! This was no help to me!
Spraying this on things actually attracted our dog. She was obsessed with licking it, in fact, even more than before. Sigh.
When i sprayed it, i tasted the bitter in the air. I think it had more ill affect on me than it did my pet. it did not deter the chewing. i used it unsparingly and repeatedly to no avail.
It was a waste of money for my puppy.  He seemed to like the taste!  It would actually attract him wherever I sprayed it!
This was ineffective in preventing my dog from chewing things. I ended up buying cinnamon oil (food grade) which finally did the trick.

Alright so I tried this on two of my pets - a shih tzu and a miniature pig. I mainly bought it for the pig as there was a spot of carpet she had been picking at lately and I wanted to discourage it before it became a problem.

Well, this stuff arrived and I figured I should test how good it is - or rather how bad it tastes? Both pets generally take anything from my hand that I offer and then spit it out if they don't like it so for my test I tried a plain old scrap of paper. Sprayed some of this on and gave it to the shih tzu. He ate it and then asked for more. Then did this with the pig as well. Same result. They both sat there and looked even hungrier like when was I going to give them another scrap of paper covered with this stuff. I repeated the process once more to be sure. I then put some on my finger and they both licked it clean.

Needless to say I decided not to spray it on my carpet since both of my pets seemed to love the taste.

It doesn't work as well as other products. My dog doesn't seem to mind the taste. When you spray it on things the fine mist goes in the air and you breathe it in and you can taste it, it's horrible. It also has an awful smell to it.
These are perfect for my little girl and she uses them on cold days. They stay on, unlike many others we have tried.
Once your dog gets used to these boots, they are very helpful to the pup! Like the double strap. Still slips but doesn't get cold!,

I bought these for my pooch. He's an eleven pound shihtzu.  The extra small boots were loose around his paws and he was very uncomfortable wearing them. He has rubbber boots that fit more snuggly and has no problem wearing those.  The velcro strap also doesn't do much and they came off just wearing them in the house.  The only good thing was I was able to return them for a full refund with no questions.

My dog's front paws are larger than the other two.
I specifically measured and bought the right size.

Size seems just a bit bigger, so the straps can't be tightened enough.
It started to flap out during the walk, and I was shocked to see the he got a bleeding blister from his old wounds.

It would have been better it fit and stayed on in one place, but it goest flap flap flap.
I may need to come up with an idea to some how tighten it.

You may want to buy a smaller size because of above.
Price is too steep for me to just try and throw away.

was looking forward to it.
hmm.

2 stars..
Much better than other boots I've bought. Stay on and durable.
my four legged friend has dirt free paws after wearing this
It took a while to figure out how to get them to stay on but once I did, they have my 19 yr old Shih  Tzu even occasionally run on the slippery wood floors
They stayed on my pups feet for a few blocks and then they slipped right off. My dog is about 10 lbs.
Can't get my dog to wear them. He keeps trying to shake off his feet. I have a chihuahua and he's picky about every thing.
These seem to be made well but the sizes are really big for being Extra Small.  Didn't fit on the dog very well so I haven't really used them much
Simply didn't stay on the paws of my pug. Not sure if it's a breed-specific problem but were useless to me. Also don't look very durable.

Just as described but my miniature long haired dashaund was able to shake them off in a few seconds no matter how I put them on. Might work better on a less hairy breed or a dog more tolerant of "things " on them. He likes clothes but was not digging the "shoes".

Velcro ties do not adjust and fit properly on my dogs paws.  I thought these were water proof, but did not meet up with my expectations.  A bit disappointed, constantly have to check to make sure boots are on dogs paws while walking in the snow (occasionally slipping off paws :-(
These fall off of my dogs feet.... no matter how tight I get them
Dog was able to undo and remove instantly.
They don't stay on when it snows or on rough terrain no matter how tight i make them.

The boots are not waterproof and don't stay on. Purchased them for our 18 pound pug. They are a little large. The problem we have is they will not stay on because the velcro is stiff and is not elastic at all. Our other dog boots from Fashion Pet are the same except they have elastic with the velcro at the ends and they stay on, the elastic doesn't hold up though. The other problem with Ultra Paws is they have a large foam pad stitched on the inside back of the boot which serves no purpose and actually made the boot not stay on at all, removed the pad with a seam ripper and we now have a 30% chance of returning with them on.
Well made but my beagle would not wear them
The quality seemed good, but they were too big and I had to send them back. It's hard to know how to order them online!
Keep my dogs feet so warm. Love them
Easy to put on and my dog doesn't object to them.
Completely failed to stay on and have turned into an occasional chew toy.

Quick delivery (delayed a little bit by a massive blizzard). Boots are good although we may have benefitted from a size smaller because they do fall off if they're not on tightly. Very easy to out in and take off which is huge when you have a squirmy dog who constantly wants to go out!

I got x- small. My 10 # shihtzu fits great in them. Velcro closure makes it easy to put on and tighten up. His paws are a little lost in the boot. We need them for the cold temps so he can withstand the snow while going out to do his business.

Got these for my 25ish pound Miniature Schnauzer who loves snow but is having issues with snow and ice balls forming between her toes when I take her snow shoeing.  These work better than I thought they would!  If you take the time to make sure they are on tight they stay on very well.

It was pretty funny watching her try them on for the first time, have your phone ready to make the video!  Once she hit the snow, however, she got it and off she went!  Just like a puppy again!

Although the sizing was a bit off (slightly large despite closely following the instructions and measuring twice), these dog boots were exactly as described.

Unfortunately, the dog was less than impressed with them. Was afraid he'd do more damage to his hips trying to get rid of them than simply walking without them. It was worth a shot and I'd bet the effectiveness heavily depends upon the dog's personality.

Not docking the review for that...just one star off because of the sizing issue.
Unfortunately I've had an extremely hard time keeping these on my pups feet..  They fall off within a few minutes of a walk
Doesn't fit my dog and a full refund doesn't cover shipping cost.
They looked nice but even small or Xsmall was to big from my dog.  So I returned them before my dog would have broken a leg.
Reasonable product but the X-Small were HUGE on my 7.5 lb chi-weenie.

These boots were way bigger than advertised. It seems like someone could actually design boots to work on dogs but nothing I've seen is designed well. The only upshot was is that my dogs spent more time trying to get them off which distracting them from digging more holes in the yard. But it only took five minutes for them to get them off.
the boots are really nicer than expected.  However my dog hates them and tries to pull them off,

The price was great and the shipping really quick. I do recommend this seller for that reason. The booties work most of the time on our elderly dachshund, keeps him from slipping on our hardwood floors. However, they do tend to slip off because they are not formed to fit a dog's leg. Outside, they tend to slide around until the tread is on the top. I think these would work much better and stay on longer if there they were shaped to fit the bend of a dog's leg where the "ankle" is. I think I might bend them and put a stitch there to give them a boot shape instead of mitten shape. They really do help though, and it's so funny watching them get used to walking in them.
The XS were way too big for 4lb yorkie. They looked like ridiculous hotpads on her paws. She couldn't walk in them.  The bootie hotpads fell off immediately. Come in a package of 4.
they do not stay on during short walk
Boots kept falling of my old dog's paws. May have been due to the wy he walks.

My dog is older and has been dragging his back paws for awhile now.  It makes it difficult for him to walk on the hardwood and vinyl floors in our house.  These boots work great, and he doesn't mind wearing them.  I highly recommend them.
The ultra paws worked great for my pappilion in the snow and freezing rain. The velcour kept them on snug and they were easy to put on and take..

Purchased these after returning another product and these are great!! My pomeranian was having trouble going outside in our COLD Ohio winters and these kept her feet warm and she was able to be out longer!!! They stay on well as long as you make them tight. Would recommend if you live in a cold winter state :)
Durable , very waterproof and easy to put on and take off for doggy would definetly reccommend these for others
Used these for every subzero day this winter and they are great! They stay on and my dog doesn't have as hard a time walking in them as she did with others. Great item!
I was skeptical when ordering, what seemed like such a small size, for my medium size dog.  When the boots arrived they fit perfect.  Follow the sizing guidelines and you won't be disappointed.
Once he got used to them on his paws, he loved it, walked 1/2 mile in 6in of snow with no problem

I bought these for my puggle (pug, beagle mix).  She is very hot/cold sensitive and this winter we've been having has really taken a toll on her when we go out to do her business.  She literally shivers and holds her paws up off the ground (we live in the Midwest and it hasn't been above 20 here for over 30 days now).  After getting used to these, going outside isn't as painful for her now.  She can scamper all around without having to lift her paws while she stands.  The only complaint I have is the measuring system.  These were an X-Small, and I measured as the instructions said to, but they are still quite large on her.  So just be sure to note that they do run a little bit bigger than what you'd expect.  The XX Small would have fit better, but these will certainly do.  Other than that, no complaints with the product!
These boots are durable, warm, keep her feet dry, and most importantly, STAY ON HER FEET! Definitely a must have!

I followed the sizing guidelines, and believe it or not, my 70 pound German Shepherd required X Small boots.  They are the correct width, and they fit snugly over her paws.  But they are far too short, and they don't go up past her "wrist".  So they frequently slip off.  The top material is easily penetrated by her claws, and they are coming apart after just a few days.

We live in Minnesota and have many sub-zero days when it was impossible for our Bichon to stay outside more than 30 seconds. With these boots, she doesn't mind the cold at all. They allow us to go for walks even on the coldest days. She was cooperative about using them right from the start and I can get all four on in 30 seconds. Just make sure you pull the fastener really tightly and they won't come off.
My Yorkie likes them, at the begining she had a little problem walking but now she is used to them and they are good for the cold weather, keeps her paws dry and warm.

We hit -40F yesterday and even though our shih tzu isn't crazy about wearing them, Ultra Paws save his feet. (But, I don't like wearing mittens either ;-) On most walks (1 block round trip or less) he usually throws one or two off so I have to keep my eyes on the road. But, the Ultra Paws have made it possible to take those winter walks and pee on all his favorite snow banks.

One nice touch I noticed was a pad sewn into the inside on the upper part where the velcro wraps around the leg. It makes it a bit more comfortable for him when I wrap those velcros around his ankle.

One of the straps was split and I had to use another strip of velcro in order to use the boot.

I tried several brands and they would come off when my dog was in a full run. These stay on in long distances. The tred could be a little thicker and they make the paws sweat but other than that they are golden.

My Buddy could not stand on the tile or hard wood floors. His legs would just spread out. These gave him immediate traction. They were a MIRACLE. I tried socks which were fine but kept falling off. These stayed put until I took them off (to walk him outside).

This is a must have in your doggie wardrobe Gosh.... The boots have been such a help, because my dog's feet are white.  It's such a relief !!!!!! Whew no more dirty paws. I hated to take him for a walk. But now it's so much better. Thanks amazon :)

The dog I cared for was unable to walk outside due to a yeast infection in his pads and with ultra paws he was able to go for a walk for the first time in a month in a half. He had no problems walking in his ultra paws as a matter of fact, he was galloping!

I have a Toy French Poodle four years old and his name is Chunky Roberto around twelve pounds, usually in winter he was getting his paws and fur wet and I decided to give this product a try.

-Is a plus to make sure about the size, triple check! ( I got the XS and worked perfect )

-Make sure you tight enough so when your pet run the won't come off.

Still working with Chunky to put it on, he does not like it (and I understand, is not his nature) but once outside he walks and run as nothing. First time shoes for my dog it was not bad! Good for after rain and snow (not very wet paws!).

I have a 13lb Cavalier King Charles-Poodle mix. I ordered the X-small boots (her paws measured 1 1/2"). The boots looked a little bulky when I first saw them, but once I got them on and tightened both straps they seemed to fit well. Having 2 straps to secure them makes a huge difference. There is also foam on the front and the back to help secure the boot around the leg. As others have mentioned, these are not great for snow more than a couple inches deep. I let my dog run through the snow which is about 6" deep and she did get some snow on her legs right above the boots. However, the boots were tight enough to prevent snow getting inside, leaving her paws completely dry. We will definitely be using this when we go on walks in the winter!
waste of money. Flavorless, healthy food doesn't have to taste this bad!
What the?!  Every package in this box tasted funky.  It doesn't even resemble what it should taste like!  Put it this way, I'd pay $5 for the entire case..
Some products were as other mentioned, a little cardboard-y, but, overall, pretty darn good! Nice flavor/texture variety, ok health wise.

Not much taste.  Barely edible.  Dry. Bland.  Zero flavor.

BLECK!!!
I was not able to eat these snacks because I have not teeth.  Whet I was able to soften and eat were very good and very convenient.
These were mostly pretty good. There were 1 or 2 I didn't care for much, but overall pretty good. I'll definitely buy again. I don't know why they're called mini meals, they're just snacks.
Great tasting products!  Definitely buying more of these!

I decided to purchase these as a new protein snack alternative. They are OK when you first bite into them but I find some of them have a strong after taste. That being said I knew going in that these were not going to be fantastic tasting since they are low in sugar/high inprotein. I would purchase them again.
These did not taste good at all. I was really disappointed.

With the first bite, it isn't that sensational. It tastes pretty close to what you expect "protein snacks" to taste like. But I liked the variety and I found these snacks very filling. Some of them were tasty. If you're like me and you're gonna snack anyway, you could certainly do worse than this!
Wife bought these for snacks at work. She liked all of them except the cinnamon sugar pretzels. All in all these were a good buy, and had great flavor.
Some of the flavors are weird some are good. I don't really know where I stand with this product.
Ok, but more a snack than a meal, mini or otherwise. Higher protein than other crunchy snacks, so pretty good in that way, but not very tasty.

I didn't like the cheese puffs but I did like all the other flavors. Buying this helped me to know which flavors I would enjoy so I could reorder just those. The texture is a little crunchier then an actual pretzel or cereal, but the flavor is good for a diet product.
Trying to find healthy snacks that also taste good and these just didn't cut it.  Horrible tasting.
Need Protein on the GO??? This is a great way . . .
Disappointed in these. Many had steevia (which I didn't know beforehand). Most are very dry. I won't buy this product again.
these are very interesting- I was trying to mix up snacks for my son.  The portion size is good, some of the flavors weren't what he cared for.

Don't let the name fool you! These are not meals but an odd assortment of snacks. Some of these products were good, but others just had a strange taste in the name of extra protein. The taste is not worth how much you are paying for these.
some of. the flavors aren't he best but looking for some different type of snack. It fits the job!
They work in a pinch, not bad, but rather dry.

I had field training & sometimes used these in place of my MREs. I love the variety of flavors. The small packets kept me full longer and that was surprising. They taste great! Plus, you can take them as a snack when traveling. Great product!

I ordered these as kind of a grab-and-go snack for work or if I forgot to eat breakfast. The majority of them are good the white cheese crisps and the chili cheese crisps are extremely good the rest are decent I've seen a lot of people complain about the price but the same box on the Kay's natural website cost $10 more so the price here is awesome will be ordering again

I've bought these a few times!  Most of the packages are great although there's one or two that are "duds" but I'll still eat even those.  Great source of a snack and a protein yum yum.  I'll purchase it again too!
Yes they taste healthy but that doesn't mean bad.  Big variety, great nutritional profile.  Perfect for my plans to put on some muscle.
come in under the search for VEGAN snacks in Prime Pantry...they are not Vegan.
For a healthy snack food, I love these. Convenient and tasty. Maybe not as good tasting as popular junk food, but great for a protein snack/protein bar alternative.

Not sure why there are so many negative reviews on these products.  Bought this variety package to try Kay's Naturals products and I have liked all of them.  I never get enough protein and love snack food, and am always on the go- so these products are perfect for me!

I haven't tried all the flavors, but about half of them so far are edible to me. They're not as good as my favorite medifast options (optavia, tsfl-berry crunch cereal, smores bars, honey mustard pretzels) but at half the price this was a good exploratory purchase to find things I like in a lower price range. I learned as a health coach that when it comes to meal replacement food like this, people's tastes are wildly different, so if you're looking for something cheaper than medifast, this is a great exploratory option. I won't be buying this particular package again, but have already started ordering the options I like in bulk separately. This actually has many more options that satisfy my sweet tooth, which I found to be a pleasant surprise!
I would rate these 0 stars if I could. I tried each type and they are all flavorless, the texture is horrible even for gluten-free. I honestly think I'd choose hunger over eating these.

I tried. I really did. These are hideous. My newly college graduated nephew thought they were terrible too, but as a broke youngun' he took them off my hands!! I really wanted to like these so that I could have a healthy boost of protein to manage my blood sugar and stay slim, but they really are unbearable - I'd rather eat nothing or a rice cake.
These al taste pretty good for healthy snacks.
Some of the flavors were all right and filling. Some of the flavors have that fake sugar substitute in them and I am allergic to that. Oh well.
A couple of the flavors are just...... off.
Didn't care for the flavor of almost all of these so was a waste of money for me.  Threw most of them away.
They all taste horrible and you feel like you are eating something bad for you as you eat it. I do not recommend these to anyone looking for healthy snacks.

Great protein snacks with minimal to low sugar content - I have ordered multiple times.  Love them all.  Using daily along with the "N" diet plan advertised on TV all the time.  Have lost 30 pounds so far!!
Would not recommend poor taste and gives off bad after taste. Dont waste your time and mo ey on this one
Great for when you're in a hurry or just want to snack on something.  I've had most of them and so far I am very satisfied with the flavors and texture.
Celiac's Disease daughter literally could not eat these at all - I tried them and neither one of us liked the flavor of any of the products
I thought they tasted good. But I did not realize it is soy protein.

This is definitely not meant to be your standard snack, it is a health food and should be expected to taste like one. Personally, I've enjoyed a lot of the flavors they offer. Some of them leave a funny taste in your mouth, but the same could be said for protein shakes.

These snacks are tasty, healthy, and at a reasonable price so I will be happily buying them again.
A real waste of my money.  Boring, very little flavor

This product is going to help me out so much. I bought the box just to use the individual treats as snacks while at work but after reading the insert I am going to order again and begin the program. I cannot stand ultra sweet or super salty snacks so I avoid chips, cookies, crackers, etc. When I searched for healthy snacks and saw that these were not your average junk food, I bought them to try out. I will say that the odd texture on some isn't surprising considering they're gluten free. Other than that, I have nothing but good words for the flavors. When you create the meals by adding fresh fruits and vegetables, yogurt, and the other suggested products, you will save yourself calories, control your portions, and ultimately feel better.
I loved a few of the flavors and some did not care for as much. It's great for me to throw in my bag for a healthy snack that's high protein.
These taste like you overcooked a loaf of bread and threw some seasoning on the rock hard stone you call food. The taste is horrible and all of them taste the same no matter the seasoning or flavor.

I ordered these because I was looking for a gluten-free, high protein snack to keep with me at the office and in my car because I'm on the road a lot!  I would not order these again for any amount of money.  They taste like cardboard and my 7 year old granddaughter and grandson would not even eat them.  They are not worth the money at all.
If I was smarter, I'd leave a bad review so they stay in stock and reduce price.

After reading some bad reviews I'm confident about leaving mine because I don't want them to stop producing those. It is true not every single taste can be your favorite, but it is so personal. What I loved - my husband didn't and other way around. But the idea of crunchy snack that is full of proteins not fat and sugar and does not cost $5 per ounce. I'm not on any sort of diet, but I am on the run. And for me one of those bags plus an apple is a perfect lunch option.
Advice - get this box, try what's inside and then buy only flavors you like. Amazon sells them individually in packs of 6.
P.S. I'm lactose intolerant for last 9 years and because of those I can enjoy flavors like Mac And Cheese, pizza or cheddar sticks again))))))

Every single 1 of these pack are absolutely delicious. I didn't buy it for the weight loss benefit, although that's a definite advantage, I was looking for a gluten free something that tasted like real food, and I certainly did find it!!
My kids did not enjoy eating these. I was hoping for a healthier gluten free snack for them to take to lunch.

Bought these in the hopes of having something nutritious around for the family to snack on, but this company has not been at all successful in getting pea protein to taste decent. The snacks do fill you up and are better for you than potato chips or something, so we we're able to get through about half the box, but the rest we just had to dump as we couldn't get past the taste.
My husband and kids HATED these. I was okay with them...until halfway through the bag. It started tasting gummy.

Useful when I forget to eat but some of the flavors are a bit weird.  Of course I don't ever buy regular snack foods with bbq and other flavors.  Never liked them.  I wish I could hand pick what goes in the box.  The cookie and cinnamon and parmesan flavors are my favs, Cheeses without extra flavorings stuck in are my other favorites. Being a gastric bypass patient and celiac, these are very useful.
Bought these for my Gluten Free wife and she loves them.
great idea.  great packaging.  great nutritional content... best case description, this product tastes like flavored cardboard.  yuck.  can't imagine looking forward to this snack.
I was surprised to see low stars.  I thought they were great, but I've been gluten free for over 6 years.  For the cost, convenience, nutrition, AND being gf I think they deserve 5 stars.
Most of the items tasted stale to me. I have had better gluten free products. I did like the chili and  one other.

This is a great way to determine what flavors you like best. I love the cereals and the cheese flavored items. Some of the other flavors are not my favorite but even my 8 year old nephew (who is very picky) ate the cereal without complaint. This is a much more nutritious option that most cereals or chips out there. I also love the portion control because of the small bags. I have to make myself only eat one, but these are perfect for the office or school lunch bag.

These were for my college aged daughter to take to her classes and be able to eat a quick snack in between classes, keep her energy up, and be able to slide into her back pack easily before leaving home. She tries to eat healthy due to an autoimmune disease , so products that are made more naturally are a must for her. So glad there are products like this out there to choose from.
If you have had any kind of WLS, this is perfect. Seriously.

I did not realize this was part of a diet program - it seems to be some sort of lose weight in a few weeks thing and that said - it might be fine for it's intended purpose. But I just wanted a high protein snack to replace the chips and cookies I love but don't need. I wanted to like them - I tried - and they are NOT flavorless like some reviews said - they have plenty of flavor but the flavor is awful! Truly. And if you can get past the awful flavor you have to deal with the chalky / gritty texture. I give them two stars for a great idea - but they failed in every other way. Sorry Kay's Naturals.

Filled me up better than your average snack. I keep these in my classroom cupboard for days when I don't have time for lunch. The high protein content leaves me feeling much fuller than your typical snack. If people have not eaten gluten free foods before then the texture might seem odd, but I liked all the ones I have tried so far. The flavors aren't as powerful as snacks you are used to, but I find typical flavored snacks to be overly flavored. So again, I liked them. I have tried about 5 of the items so far.
Nasty tasteless. Ugh. I'll never buy this again.

My husband needed protein on the go & this fit the bill.  As others have described, some bags are amazing & others are not.  If I could give 3.5 stars I would because it sucks to spend the money & have 75% be great, but it is as described so 4 will do.

Good stuff. Flavors and variety consistent. My coworkers stopped with the hating after they seent me looking and feeling better after having these instead of the usual go to junk snacks that we are tempted with. #BEEFCAKE #BEASTMODE
If someone complains about the flavor of these snacks, they have ridiculous expectations. These are low calorie high protein snacks, and some of the best I have ever tried.

They all taste pretty good.  Having Celiac Disease, its frustrating finding  gluten free snacks that taste good AND are not made solely of corn. The price is pretty reasonable as well. Am going to buy again, definitely!!

I know the dates on the packages states they are not expired. But MANY of them tastes very old. Like they have been in a cabinet for 1000 years. I understand the bland taste.. but many tasted OLD. Veggie puffs and Mac N Cheese puffs along with the cereal were good but the rest are gross. Threw out many of them.
Taste is okay.  Kind of expensive but works.
The snacks are a good idea, just don't taste that good.  My 15 year old that eats anything in sight won't eat these at all....disappointed.
Great snack for my husband  hes diabetic and needs high protein, low or (better yet) NO sugar snacks.
I would give this no star if I could. It tastes terrible! I had to throw almost all out. Don't buy
Not enough variety and each product has an aftertaste.
Taste of most of these flavors are crunchy cardboard... the cereal flavors are all delicious but the rest are eh!
Got for kids for lunch or after school Hoping extra protien would satiate longer. No go. The youngest, 6yo liked a few ok. The older two 11 & 12 didn't like at all. :(
The texture and flavor scare lacking. Will not buy again.
Great idea, but some of the packages aren't so pleasant tasting.
Taste dry and flavorless.  Would not recommend.  There are much better tasting products available that are less expensive.
I will definitely be purchasing these items again!  Very delicious and easy to grab on the go.

I'm a vertical sleeve gastrectomy (gastric surgery) patient and I'm always looking for good sources of protein and Kay's Natures has a lot of products that really suit my needs.

I would highly recommend the assortment so you can find the products that meet your taste requirements. I couldn't live without the "puffs" and "cookie bites". I love the portability and the portion control, not to mention the flavor. So, so much better than a lot of protein products that just taste like compressed cardboard. All these products have a good texture and flavor.

This assortment will save you money in the long run. Instead of having to buy a case of something you don't know if you're going to like you can try it in the assortment. I can almost guarantee there will be something you love and want to purchase a case of.
I've tried a variety of items from the box so far and they are all very dry and just gross. I will not buy again.
Really tasty, good price, high protein and low fat and carbs - can't ask for more
Macros are pretty good and flavour is on point.
I liked them my granddaughter did not probably too healthy for her
Everything in this box tasted like lightly seasoned cardboard
Not for me - the texture and flavor was just off
These are tasty, pretty filling and only 3 weight watchers smart points.
These were ok but not great.  Some were so hard I couldn't eat them. I was hoping for sweet snacks but these were not.
This product had a horrible chemical taste.  I had to throw it out.

I bought these in a weak moment, telling myself I would only eat 3 (half the serving) each day.  Turns out, I can't do it.  They are so good I had eaten all 6 of them before I knew it.  BAM!  420 calories, 10g of Saturated fat & 18g of FAT in total.  I really can't figure out how Hostess can cram *that many calories* into these little donuts.  I mean, they are really dry inside so it doesn't seem possible they could have so much fat!  I have to believe it, surely Hostess wouldn't label them to say they have way more calories than they actually do.  So, like the Muddy Buddy snacks (that didn't taste all that great), I am currently handing them out to the trick-or-treaters.  The younger children aren't selecting these, but the bigger ones (age 7 & up) are.  There are only a couple of packs left and I will be glad when this temptation is out of my house.  For taste, I would give them 5 stars.  But I had to remove one because nutritionally they don't earn even one star.
I enjoy an occasional donut now and again, and when I got these from amazon, they were the absolute, freshest donuts I've ever sank my teeth into. OMG. Soooo good.  #Want - and so #Ordered.

I order these online because they aren't available locally where I live, and these are by far my favorite Hostess snack.  I have tried competitor's "crunch" donuts, and I haven't found any that I remotely like.  For me this is "the" snack donut that I can't live without.  It's not just me.  The whole family love these donuts.  If you want to bribe me with something, then look no further.

If you are a fan of any of the competitor's crunch snack donuts and you haven't given the Hostess crunch donuts a shot, I highly recommend that you give them a try.
I actually love these crunch Donettes; unfortunately the ones I received were not fresh.
These things are PERFECT if you love the taste of toasted coconut you will like these. Not the healthiest of foods, but as a once in awhile treat it cant be beat!
the donettes was not fresh very very dry crumble when eating
they arrived here stale and didn't taste very good.  they should not have been sold to me.  they need replaced .  its the right thing to do!

OK - these were good (not great because it's just packaged donuts.) But I have lost my privileges of ever buying this many again.  Shoot I ate two packages a day sitting at my computer.  Ack!  One package seemed to be going on to the stale side. But it was the last one and I wasn't letting that stop me.  Be warned, if you live alone buying these in bulk may be dangerous.

I got these donuts at a gas station. I mistakenly picked these up instead of the Crumb ones. Holy smackeral! They were so sweet, it made my eyes water. It's like they were rolled in granulated sugar and a few coconut bits. At 10 carbs per donette... I won't be buying these again. For those with a super sweet tooth, these are probably for you.
Taste better from the grocery store, these arrived dried out.
They were very stale,  Got a refund and tossed them in the trash.

When the title says "6 count (Pack of 10)", it does not mean you get 6 boxes with 10 packages in each, but rather 1 box with 10 packages with 6 donettes each.  So instead of getting 360 donettes (6 boxes x 10 packages/box x 6 per package), you really only get 60 donettes (1 x 10 x 6).

The box actually says "10 - 6 packs" thus most people would think "6 count (pack of 10)" would mean 6 boxes.

Freeze them and have them with Coffee in the morning a few at a time.  It is heavenly.
Only place I know of you can get them in semi bulk.  Best flavor IMHO.
I love these donettes typically, however, these were not fresh and were dry.
These were not good at all and I ended up throwing them out because they were so hard
I've never eaten goat feces, but I imagine this is what they would taste like. Disgustingly horrible.
Sorry, but I did not like these at all!  I didn't like the taste nor the consistency of the noodles.  Won't order again!
Odd smell out of the box.  The flavor is good.  These are great if you want something as fast as a cup noodle product without the crazy amount of sodium.

Should be called "Garlic, garlic, garlic noodles."
I like garlic, but not printing the word on something with this much garlic is irresponsible.
love the way this tastes. Good flavor and doesn't have as much salt as regular ramen noodles do.
To each their own- I didn't enjoy the flavor. I didn't taste soy or ginger.

Because of the way my new work schedule is, I typically eat lunch at my desk... however, if I get super busy I sometimes am so distracted that I don't realize I'm hungry.  Or by the time I do, it is almost time to go home.  So about a 1/3 of my packed lunches were going to waste.

These are nice alternatives.  I can keep them in my desk drawer and eat them when the mood strikes.  It tastes fine and will tide me over.  Is it a super filling, 5 star gourmet meal... no.  But it isn't meant to be.  The ingredient list is better than a cup-o-noodles, and while anything like this has a lot of sodium, they aren't complete calorie bombs.

I will order these again.

I know these little cup-o-noodle-things are always sodium, but MAN, this was a salt bomb.  May try one w/o the "seasoning packet" or just half.  But the first one was so unappetizing, I'm not in a rush to do #2.  disappointing.
good for a noodle cup, vegetarian - yay!
It tastes weird and you have to watch it when you use the microwave or it will boil over.
weird textured noodles, bland broth - just ew.
Yummy easy to make, a quick light meal in a cup.

This is so far divorced from the concept of "asian noodles" as to be a joke. Doesn't taste like ginger, and has an overbearing chewy grain flavor that ruin the palate. These would taste good only to someone who has never had any kind of East Asian-style noodles in their life, and it's abundantly clear that the manufacturer hasn't a clue what they're making.

These are so wrong in so many ways.  Truly disgusting.  From the mealy noodles to the bland broth, they got absolutely nothing right with these "soy ginger" noodles.  I know it says it's all natural, but there is nothing natural tasting about these noodles, and not even a heavy dose of Sriracha could help me choke them down.
good for my dogs but do not last too long...
My dog loves these .. Keeps him busy on my long days out of house
Stained the carpet and really didn't last that long.

My black lab loves the treat ball these fit in. He loves the liver treat as well but I gave 4stars just because it's labeled as everlasting and anything he can devour in 5mins doesn't quite qualify. He has a much harder time getting the smaller treats out from the inside than these.

I have two issues with these treats. My dog is not supercanine nor is he a voracious chewer but he got through one of these in a few hours. I realise it was supposed to be in a holder of some sort but I didn't realise this at the time.

The second issue is that he snuck away to gobble it up in a separate room, which happened to be carpeted. The combination of his copious slobber and this treat creates an unappealing brown foam/goo which went into the carpet. I see another reviewer has said this too.

these are made to insert into a special ball, which i have, but don't use because they are so hard to insert. l still like them for two reasons- my dog LOVES them, and they last longer than anything except maybe a yak chew. keeps her in chewing nirvana for hours.
While they did last a while my dog actually broke out one of his front teeth resulting in a $400 vet bill as the other half had to be surgically extracted.
Soooo this is some pretty false advertising because my dogs ate this thing in 15 minutes. Cool.
These were great, took close to an hour to finish, that's long for my pups. And the shape kept them entertained and engaged the whole time.
Dogs love it but did not last long for the Boxer or Blue blood bulldog

My dog loves these, but after purchasing, I have two problems with these.  First and most concerning, these are made in China. Secondly, my standard poodle gets the treats out and eats them within 30 minutes. I will not be buying in the future simply because they are not made in the U.S., but may reconsider if they ever move manufacturing back to the states.
Long lasting and my dogs love the peanut butter flavor.
Everlasting is sooo not true had to take them away after 3 minutes my large dog got hers more than half consumed in that time my smaller dog ate more than a quarter it in that same amount of time.
My dog loves this but he kept vomiting the next day after he had it, took him to the vet after the 3rd time and found out they were recalled
4 stars because my dog loved it, but it was not as long lasting as I would have hoped. Lasted only a short car ride.
Hearty soup with chunks of meat, potatoes & carrots.
Pot roast.  I expected more from Progresso.  I had to purchase in a multi-pack, so now I have cans to donate, I suppose.  Nasty flavor.
too much broth, not enough meat and potatoes
This is my favorite soup flavor. I would buy from seller again.
Soup has good flavor. It is a thinner soup with broth, but plenty of meat and veggies in it.

Watery broth, overaged beef taste. Will not purchase again. Even my 18-year-old son doesn't like it. So disappointing to think we cold find a good gluten free option for the cupboard. Going to donate the rest of the cans to the food bank. Maybe we are just picky.
Got this for my boyfriend. One of his favorites by Progresso. Never disappoints!
This is not a pack of 4 as the description reads, I only received 1 individual can. $5 for one can is absolutely ridiculous!

Good soup, would recommend and buy again. I prefer most of the Progresso soups over Campbell's except for the basic add water chicken noodle when I'm not feeling well. Reminds me of my childhood and how uncomplicated life seemed back then...

Normally I buy another brand but decided to go with these guys in a recent order. In short, after pouring it into a bowl just before heating it up... it just seemed like a watered down bowl of nothing.  Just very cheap looking... definitely not the "Rich & Hearty" experience i was expecting from the labeling. Didn't even waste my time heating it up. Just ended up just pouring it down the garbage disposal.
I only received 1 can it was supposed to be a pack of 4 can.
Surprisingly good for a soup this cheap! Has whole onions and everything. Plus it's quite filling, you won't be hungry afterwards :)
Really good soup for those cold days or the days when cooking is out of the question.  Will order again as my local store does not carry this flavor.

This was not for my liking but I put some over some mashed potatoes , minus a little liquid for my neighbor along with a salad and she loved it . Good ratio of broth to veggies to meat .
I just don't like so much salt  . Other than that it's good
Good mix with Dinty Moore and you can add some extra stuff if you want to cook some more ingredients with it.

Very weird taste. Like you wanted a grill taste so you added an artificial flavor that is supposed to imitate a grill taste or something, but came out all wrong. I threw away the whole can after trying just a bite.
Inedible taste mushy and very very spicy. Gave me upset stomach

Cooked noodles safe to eat from your shelf? You betcha. Weird sauce that doesn't have a great texture? You betcha.

I'd give it 5 out of 5 for convenience, but these are just gross. I'm saving them for the apocalypse to eat before the cat food.
Amazing.  Love these things.  Will definitely be ordering more soon. Easy meal grab one put in microwave for a minute tear open grab a spoon and eat.  Taste amazing.  Just right amount of sauce
Quick, convenient and tasty.  For on the go or just a late night snack, these are great.

So I was able to try this product for free thanks to Prego, but I really wasn't feeling the Roasted Tomato & Vegetable Penne, there was waayyy to much sauce in it in my opinion,  but either then that,  the way u heat for one minute and grab & go is what makes it so fun to make for your family and friends!
my son wouldnt even try them! said they looked gross!

Thanks to Prego I received this meal for free ;) I had high hopes for it as I love Prego. However I was disappointed. I was shocked at the calorie content at first. The packaging was great! Very simple one minute in, one minute sit, grab at the cool spots and tear open, the package was sturdy to eat from and I was surprised that it was clear at the bottom. Now on to the flavor and texture it was thick but the noodles seemed to be cooked just right however there was just to much tomato paste flavor and acid that was overpowering...the heartburn after was horrible. Though they are handy and quick to make in a pinch.

If you're expecting something fancy you should look elsewhere.

This food is almost as one would expect it, similar in noodle and sauce texture to that of chef boyardee or spaghetti-o's.

However the sauce doesn't taste quite similar outside of the slightly sweet, which seems to have become the norm even with the jarred sauce.

As far as satiation it does a fairly decent job for a couple hours, but should be eaten with something else as well lest hunger strike again quickly.

I do plan on purchasing more of these in the future.

One of the best parts is that you don't need to empty it onto another container, you can eat it right out of the package which is helpful as someone who works at his desk most of the day.
Wonderful sauce perfectly done macaroni ready fast just nuke add a salad meal in minutes

The person who came up is amazing. This is great for a couple reasons 1) Its only 60 second to heat 2) You can eat it out of the bag so you don't need to also bring a bowl to work 3) You can keep it in your bag until you need it (no need to put in freezer/fridge ect) 4) it also tastes good too. Awesome!

This one has potential, it didn't have the chalky texture like the creamy penne did, some lemon pepper made it seem edible until I was finished chewing. Two bites and it took what feels like forever to get the horrible plastic after taste out of my mouth.

It's definitely not homemade. Obvi. I mixed a pouch of the Italian sausage & rotini and the garden vegetable ziti. That made the experience a little better. Also, it balanced out the sweet and the spice of the two pouches. I can't remember which, but one was overly sweet and the other was a bit spicy. Overall, I liked these as a quick dinner and will be buying them again.
This is way too spicy for us, taste wasn't great either. Like camp food. I expected twigs. Just not what was expected. Have purchased other brands much better & more tasty.

Really good stuff. If you are needing to grab something fast and you're not in the mood for a sandwich, this is great. It is a couple of steps up from chef-b**-Rd. The pasta is not mushy. There is plenty for a full adult meal. My husband and I both liked it.
We like these fast and yummy meals.  Healthy ingredients. Will buy again.

Definitely not buying again. I get the fact that it's a ready meal and so it will be full of salt, but there was so much that I could not finish the pouch and was sick to my stomach. Gave the rest of the meals to my boyfriend. Good thing he likes salt.
Took me a while to like the taste of this one. It turned out alright in the end. Quick meals!
Great taste, high in carb and sodium but a  great alternative when you are short on time.

Nobody in the family seems to like them.  The only way they have been edible is to completely wash off the sauce, and add our own.  I don't know what it is...too rich in a bad way, too "canned" tasting...there is something that is just not great about them.  My 18 month old doesn't even like them, and he eats pretty much whatever you put in front of him.

Oh, this is sooooo yummy! I'll keep buying here until I can find it locally (I noticed Lorissa's has finally shown up in one of my local stores, but not this flavor). Learn from my mistake though: after my first taste of this, the cats found the bag and cleaned out the rest! Keep it put up!
Super yummy and great snack to throw in the hiking pack.  Since I can't have beef, it's hard to find a jerky that I enjoy and this one is perfect.
So much protein and so delicious! I tried this on a whim but I will certainly be buying more. It's a healthy snack and an easy on the go lunch if you're busy like me!
Very good to carry in your car or purse to snack on when your blood sugar level falls!
Opened bag and jerky turned moldy within a week. Not satisfied. Will not purchase again

It's pretty tasty but I prefer the other proteins under this product line. IDK what it is, but, and I know it sounds insane, but chicken jerky tastes like dried up over cooked chicken. Yeah, I know it is, but the other stuff doesn't taste like overcooked beef and pork. Regardless, this stuff is yummy. I'd easily eat t but would rather the other Lorissa's proteins.
sorry - do not enjoy this product at all.
Great idea.. Glad I tried but flavorings not as compelling/addictive... A bit chewy(but it is jerky right?).. Felt like it was legit meat and not like grocery store brands... Will try other flavors

This stuff is horrible. the reviews on here must be astroturf, looks like cubes of transluscent jelly tastes like preservative piles of lawn fertilizer, I'm giving 2 stars because it didn't give me salmonella, which suprised me based on it's looks.  Also the packaging was quite nice.
Best chicken jerky I've ever had. Soft and chewy, excellent flavor. Perfect for healthy snacking on the go or sitting on the couch.
not my favorite flavor but for others it might be good!

horrible taste. taste like smoke. will not buy again.

enver had chicken jerky but pork, and this is much worse

It's a decent pack of flavor...
If you look at the image of the chicken, add the slightly rubber feeling of all dried jerkys, then imagine a swish of soy sauce and a hint of garlic added in, then you pretty much have this down...

The packet says it's made with sea salt, but i'll be honest, I've eaten sea salt for the last 5 years, and know its taste well, and I can not taste it in this product.

I give it a robust 6/10 in flavor. It could benefit from some other elements added in... A bit bland...
I give the packaging / display a 9/10.  It is a bit standard, but it works great! There's even a cute little window in the back for you to view the product. I guess they sell this in stores elsewhere in the country, but I sure haven't seen it.
The bag seal is a firm 10/10 with no leaks.
And lastly, the freedom rating on this is a magnificent 10 / 10 for this product being proudly made in the U.S.A. and containing no added nitrates, no antibiotics, no msg, no growth hormones, and no preservatives!
I should have known better... chicken doesn't make very good jerky.  Only one member of the household was a fan of this - the dog.
Tasty but expensive, the bag is very small. My son devoured it it like 10 minutes

I understand that everyone's pallet is quite different but I love ginger and eat it everyday because of the flavor and anti inflammatory effects. I eat it fresh, in ground powdered form, drink it in tea and in almost everything I consume and this was just horrible.
Very tasty smoked salmon.  It's just a very small piece for nearly $6.
Oh wow!  This is the real deal for smoked salmon.  Small but packed with flavor.  Very juicy.  Not cheap but not cheap tasting either.  Great value.

Smoked to perfection!
I pair this with bagels-n-cream cheese for the best (breakfast, lunch, anytime) sandwich in the world.
Very small amount and a strong fishy taste.
Fresh and perfect for a small meal or add to salad or make a salmon dip.  Delish.
Not bad at all but still very fishy needs more seasoning
Super small amounts.  Flavor was a little off for us.  I'll buy from our local store next time.

I have ordered Alaska Smokehouse Smoked Salmon Fillet twice. The last time, I ordered two packages. I love salmon, but grow more hesitant to eat my relatives from the highly toxic ocean.

I like this salmon. I can make two small meals with each package. (Bagels & Cream Cheese).

It is obvious that The Alaska Smokehouse takes pride in their product and packaging. The inner vacuum foil pack is sturdy and easy to open.

The colors and the design of the cardboard package are pleasing to the eye.
Its tastes good and is a easy way to get salmon in your diet. However, the fillet is a bit overpriced for the small portion.

Came in box with Dry Goods was not refrigerated when I went to open the package to use at the smell was so bad we had to throw it out I've had smoked salmon many times before and it is Never smelled as bad as what I got,.
Most delicious experience yet!!  Delightful  It's expensive but a perfect appetizer. Will reorder for sure.
Old salmon makes for smelly, tough fish. Overpriced. NOT good.
This product should have tasted like LOX. It is more like dried Fish.
Had a strong fishy smell, not smoke smoky flavor, and had a very congealed/wet texture. Very low quality product, at least compared to the smoked salmon I'm accustomed to.

I've used the software for years, and highly recommend it to our customers. For the price, it's untouchable. It's easy to use, installs quickly, and does a great job of teaching the language in question. I cannot understand why anyone would actually pay ten times as much for one of the other brands that at best is marginally better, and at worst, is largely the same.

-Richard Bangs, co-founder Mountain Travel Sobek; host and producer for the PBS series, Adventures with Purpose

I was the Senior Buyer for the whole language and education software category at Best Buy for 5 years. In that time, the Instant Immersion brand consistently outsold all competitors. We never got any complaints, product returns and it was far and away the best selling product in our language assortment. In my opinion it's a really great product. It sounds to me like the other reviewers above have either (a) not actually used the software, or (b) have ulterior motives and are associated with one of the Instant Immersion competitors that sells for ten times the cost.  We assorted numerous other language titles but none of them had the sell through needed to stay in our assortment.
There is no way you could learn any useful spanish from this CD. It is not worth it. I wouldn't pay a dime for this horrible product. Don't waste your money.

If you want to learn straight vocabulary, then this is your product.  However, if you wish to learn how to SPEAK spanish, then don't waste your time or money.  It doesn't teach you how to construct sentences.  It basically teaches you random vocabulary and in the later lessons, uses huge sentences in which you'll only be able to pick up on the random vocabulary words to guess what they're talking about.  In short, this will leave you in the dark.  On the bright side, I now know how to say kangaroo in Spanish.

I have been trying to learn Spanish for years. Most of the products were simply too boring for me to stick with it.

This product has a ton of content for the money. There are 6 different software programs on 6 discs. The only complaint I have is that you need to swap discs for each level - good and bad.

In addition to the software, there is an audio cd as well as a DVD that you can play on a DVD player and an extra game. I haven't figured out the game yet but it is an adventure game that you need to navigate in Spanish. There is no manual so it isn't easy to figure out.

The software programs have gameshows, trivia, and many photos of items that you need to identify in Spanish. Overall, I give this product 5 stars because of the value. You simply get a lot for the money.

This product leaves you to educate yourself. The first CD (Level 1 - Disk 1) has a word list, an "easy game" a more difficult game and some other material. There is no suggestion as to how you are to use these materials or proceed through the "lessons". It is a stretch to call them lessons since that suggests some degree of organization.

I give this product one star because you can not post a rating of zero

This product leaves you to educate yourself. The first CD (Level 1 - Disk 1)  has a word list, an "easy game" a more difficult game and some other material.  There is no suggestion as to how you are to use these materials or proceed through the "lessons". It is a stretch to call them lessons since that suggests some degree of organization.

I give this product one star because you can not post a rating of zero
I recieved this and it is a grate learning tool. It is easy to follow and easy to use to learn with thanks

This would not even be worth a dollar.  You will NOT be able to learn Spanish with this.  Invest in Rosetta Stone instead.  Don't waste your money with this cheap knock off.  What you will learn might be a few simple vocabulary words and some terms or sentences but you can learn those for free from free programs, or apps or even from "Dora the Explorer" on TV.  You'd learn more from exposure to Telemundo than you will from this!  Don't buy it!
Seems like the program itself is ok but I was looking for something to use while commuting. The CD's are not compatible.

great price point
easy to use
kid friendly
reviewed by teachers and it was recommended
used by all ages jr high, hs, and adult

*I like the fact that I can sit in my living room with earbuds in my ears in the middle of a group doing their own thing and learn (repeating over and over) Spanish. I like how vocab is in a male voice and then a female voice switching with each click. I get to hear the pitch differences which have been so helpful.

*I am happy that info is delivered incrementally and you can go anywhere you want, basic to difficult and back again. You can even wear it while you sleep and learn it subliminally if you like! Or, learn it in your car using the mp3 disc. It is very versatile.
Works great, arrived quickly and my wife is well on her way to speaking spanish!  Much cheaper than rosetta stone.
Great quick and easy way to learn Spanish on the fly. Does not concentrate on the reading of a language.

Maybe it's me and I'm just not capable of learning a foreign language as an adult (funny I didn't have this hard a time with high school german).  I just cannot seem to learn from these spanish software programs - this is the third I've tried.  For me, I have had the best luck with repetitive audio programs I can listen to in the car or while running in my ipod - maybe it's just that as an adult I do not have the time to sit and do a program and get nothing else done.
This set has been around a long time and always a great way to supplement other spanish language courses.  Worth the investment.

My seventh grade homeschooled daughter has been using this product to learn Spanish.  It is easy enough to set up that she was able to do it all on her own.  We'd purchased Rosetta Stone at a much higher price, but she likes this one better.
My husband and I bought it for our niece in law and she hasn't said not one negative word about the software to us.  We guess she loves it!

I brought this product to help in college but it was a waist of time because it only teach you the basic for example 1 to 20. This product does not help you at all. The software looks cheap and the games are boring and pointless. Don't buy unless you just want to know random greetings and numbers.

This system is helpful for both beginners and advanced students. It is as good as other systems that cost you much more.

I think that Spanish should be learned by any who wish to succeed in business in the coming years, and this system gives you a good start.

I purchased "Instant Immersion" instead of Rosetta Stone which way more expensive.  I started to like it until I found out that there is no written material. No book, no pdf, nothing. Most would agree: 99% of any class I've taken had/required a book. This one doesn't, but it needs one. I'm sending my Instant Immersion back.

I took Spanish in high school and college so I know and understand what some may consider to be a lot.  But I am far from fluent.  I would say I can talk with a child and even then I am not fluent.  This program did not help me in my goal to become fluent.  It did help me increase my vocabulary but as far as becoming a Spanish speaker this program did not help.  I also found some errors with the translations.  An example is the english speaker said I am from a town and on the screen it said I am from a town called Madrid.  Like I said I know some Spanish but this program has not helped me to become fluent!  When I read the reviews it was as good as Rosetta stone but the tech support was not there, I find this not to be true.  I have gotten the test demo from then and thought it to be more helpful.

Thank you for sending it on time, but the box was destroyed when it arrived because whoever packed it, wrapped it in a paper grocery bag... really?? Maybe next time, put your merchandise in something a little sturdier so when it arrives to your client, we don't get damaged goods (just a thought).

I have not been able to start learning Spanish, because for some reason, the disks will not play in my computer or DVD player... even though the box clearly states that it is compatible.  So, I'm not thrilled, but it did arrive on time...beat up as it was.

It's kind of a fun program.  My boys (3 & 5) love computer "games", and to them, this is something of a game.  The vocabulary lessons are presented in a manner of: here are some words, now you repeat them, now you answer which is which.  That seems to work pretty well.  I have not yet gotten to any grammar lessons yet, so I can't say anything there at this time.

One factor that I really like is that the program has TWO Spanish speakers, so that you can hear two different tones of voice and accents pronouncing the words.  We will keep using this, and I hope to come back and update this review when I have gotten to the grammar lessons.

Wasted 600 dollar ...ROSETTA STONE DOESN'T WORK!!!! Level 1 works but once the words became ANYTHING LONGER THAN 6 LETTERS.....IT'S BASICALLY USELESS AND ONLY FRUSTRATES YOU. My mom is from Spain and is completely fluent and the VOICE Recognition kept on saying she wasn't saying it RIGHT and later she had one of her Spanish friends try it and it did the same.......DON'T WASTE YOU MONEY,  if you do I will sell you mine.

I bought this product for my daughter who is struggling in Spanish in college. After one week, she understood and spoke spanish better than she had after two years in high school. Her test grades improved and her conversation grade improved. The teacher noted her improvement.
Instant Immersion Spanish 1,2 & 3

We purchased this product to give us a basic introduction to Spanish. Right off the bat, none of the disks would work with a Mac. I tried three different Macs and encountered the same frustration. The disks simply will not mount. I can't review the effectiveness of the language lessons because we could only open the workbook. Do not waste your time. We will be retuning this product to the store/manufaturer!

You do not need to spend hundreds of dollars on the other people who spend so much on advertising their product! This one is the real deal.  Easy to use. iPod/iPhone friendly.  My husband is already speaking a lot of Spanish after a month! It's truly incredible.  He is ready for his trips to several Spanish speaking countries.

This program is definitely a good investment to learn basic Spanish or just brush up. It costs far less than comparable programs like Rosetta Stone. I wish there was more vocabulary in it, but I have learned a lot and am able to make and understand basic conversation. My favorite part is that I can put it on my IPOD and take it with me wherever I go.

I don't see someone learning the language. There is very little actual instruction. It provides very limited practice and relies heavily on oral input without accompanying written word. Brief lessons are followed by a  game approach. Basic guessing results in high scores. Not worth the money. I'll try Rosetta Stone instead.

I've tried several times to give this set a fair shake, but I just don't like it. It feels sort of like a cut-budget Rosetta Stone software. I don't feel as though I'm learning anything; the lessons are disjointed and sometimes confusing; and there seem to be way more discs than there should be (a language program like this can't be taking up THAT MUCH memory!). All in all, if I needed to really learn Spanish, I'd go looking elsewhere for an effective product.

My children and I are using this to learn Spanish. We love to compete with each other on the quizzes on the dvd. We have not been able to use the computer discs though because our cd drive broke.
